title: Dune: Part Two
plot: Paul Atreides unites with Chani and the Fremen while seeking revenge against the conspirators who destroyed his family.

subtitles.author: tedi
lines: 59794 63430 The battle for Arrakis took everyone by surprise.
76878 79413 By morning, the Atreides were no more.
99801 102302 Since that night, my father has not been the same.
106406 109811 His inaction is difficult for me to accept.
109844 112747 For, I know he loved Duke Leto Atreides like a son.
125359 128328 This would not be the first time the Harkonnens have done his dirty work.

136871 139406 In the shadows of Arrakis
lie many secrets...
141876 144277 but the darkest of them all may remain.
168503 170303 Shouldn't you go back to the stars,
174742 177912 I'm afraid I won't have enough time to fix things before your coming.

540174 543611 Never stand with your back
towards the open.

543644 545279 How many times do I have
to tell you that, huh?

559326 563764 They do not usually
venture this deep.

563798 565633 They wanna make sure
no Atreides escaped.
565666 568102 You think too much of yourself.

568135 570871 No, no,
we are in the deep desert.

573774 576110 They were here for us,
not for you.

579113 582183 I'm taking you somewhere
they will never find us.

601669 605739 It's full of chemicals, but good
enough for cooling systems.
666934 668936 No, no, no. I'll do it.

735803 737905 Now that the spice fields
have been secured,

737938 741175 I strongly recommend bringing
all troops out of Fremen territories.

741208 743077 We're losing too many men
to the desert.

746113 749083 - I beg your pardon?
- We're losing men to rats.

752186 754321 Fremen!
I can't confirm, my Lord.

754355 756190 Communications are hectic
in the open sands.

756223 759093 Your orders were to control
the whole planet.

761095 763998 - We are.
- I see only half of it.

765266 768102 the South is uninhabitable,
my Lord.
770437 772306 May I suggest you get some rest?

775276 777579 Kill them! Kill them!
Kill them all!
828362 829597 He's asking why we're so late.

841576 845112 - Thanks.
- Stay close to me. Hmm?

1021589 1024191 Look how your Bene Gesserit
propaganda has taken root.

1027227 1029162 Some of them already think
I'm their messiah.

1039406 1042409 If they follow me, we can
disrupt spice production.

1042442 1044278 That's the only way
I can get to the Emperor.

1045880 1047481 Your father didn't believe
in revenge.
1094596 1096296 There is spice in the food.

1185285 1190792 None of us, even dying of
thirst, would ever drink this water.
1201435 1204639 We have a thousand such places.
1209043 1213648 the Lisan al-Gaib will change the face of Arrakis.

1213681 1216316 He will bring back the trees.
He will bring back...

1234702 1238438 Never give your water away,
not even for the dead. Hmm?
1241341 1242744 Why are you showing me this?
1248482 1251786 The mother of the Lisan al-Gaib will be a Reverend Mother.
1257424 1259627 You want me to take her place?

1280047 1282083 and you have no purpose
to serve.

1282116 1286087 What else is left to do then but
to return your water to the well?
1294427 1295830 I think you should feel honored.

1295863 1297899 Well, it was a choice
between this or death,

1297932 1299767 so, you know, forgive me
if I'm not flattered.

1301936 1303638 How does one become
a Reverend Mother?

1303671 1305640 It's different from one culture
to another.
1305673 1307575 Here on Arrakis, I have no idea.

1314115 1316017 Reverend Mothers are tasked
with holding the memories

1316050 1317885 of all the Reverend Mothers
that came before them,

1317919 1321088 so I'll be given centuries
of pain and sorrow.

1396197 1398132 What are you guys
laughing about?
1404572 1405773 You don't believe in all this?

1411478 1414782 Southern tribes believe a messiah
will come to deliver us from evil.
1414815 1416884 You don't believe in the Lisan al-Gaib?

1421622 1424725 You want to control people,
you tell them a messiah will come.

1424759 1428495 - Mm-hmm.
- Then they'll wait for centuries.

1444845 1447949 He's from the South.
You didn't notice his accent?

1480715 1483551 I must not fear.
Fear is the mind-killer.

1483584 1486554 Fear, the little death
that brings total obliteration.
1486587 1488656 I will face my fear. I will...

1655022 1657892 My mother was trained
to do that.

1657925 1660828 Poison transmutation is something
advanced Bene Gesserit can do.

1676511 1679747 Let me fight beside you.
That's all I'm asking.
1745379 1749383 Only one step remains and you will become the Kwisatz Haderach.
1753220 1754855 You must do what I did.

1754888 1758192 You must drink
the Water of Life.

1758225 1761895 And your mind, it's gon... it's
gonna open and you will see.

1772940 1777579 If you wanna fight
with us, first thing, you must learn
1777612 1779547 to be one with the desert.

1781181 1784552 So, here is a tent
and enough food.

1784586 1789323 I want you to cross
that small erg and come back.

1791892 1793360 You know how to use
a paracompass?

1799099 1801503 Uh, beside the worms
and the Harkonnens,

1805306 1808876 Centipedes are very nasty.
Not the big ones.

1810578 1814248 But the little ones, you have
to worry about. And... Oh!

1816950 1820387 Don't ever,
ever listen to the jinn.

1837137 1841175 Really, be careful.
They are demons.

1844345 1846213 But it's true.
Don't listen to them.

1935570 1938005 You sandwalk
like a drunk lizard.

1941241 1942744 Yeah, I'm doing
pretty good so far.

1942777 1945345 Yeah, well, you're not even
in worm territory yet.

1964364 1966066 You have to break up
your rhythm.

1972439 1975309 Now, that's interesting
because in the filmbooks I've studied,

1975342 1978613 the anthropologists say, in order to
properly sandwalk, you actually have...

2013080 2016416 You know, I'm the only one who believes
you're gonna make it until summer?

2016450 2018218 Everyone else thinks
you won't make it two weeks.

2019587 2021054 If you wanna follow us
in the desert,

2021088 2022524 you need to know
how windtraps work.

2024391 2026661 They're simple, but they
require constant attention.

2026694 2030163 Uh, this right here,
it captures the moisture

2030197 2031633 and then it carries it
into that pocket.
2032734 2035803 Uh, and these are the filters.

2035837 2037505 They need to be changed
every three days.
2045112 2046614 Stop looking at me like that.

2053721 2055690 He will be back soon.
Don't worry.

2059259 2062730 You're right. If we want
to protect your brother,

2062764 2065867 we need all the Fremen
to believe in the prophecy.
2070437 2074709 We must convert the non-believers one by one.
2076844 2079379 We need to start with the weaker ones.
2109476 2111879 Hey, get out of here. Go.

2334936 2337104 Its shield will
only open when it fires.

2337138 2338806 I know that. What
do you think I'm trying to do?

2338840 2341843 I'll trigger it.
On my signal. Be ready.

2439974 2441809 Who taught you
to fight like that?

2448015 2451152 They were massacred.
Alongside my father.

2456724 2459894 You've been fighting
the Harkonnens for decades.

2459927 2462495 My family's been fighting them
for centuries.

2462530 2467500 I know everything about them.
Their habits, their ways of thinking.

2467535 2468769 You know everything
about the desert.

2468803 2472506 You harness
the very power of it.

2472540 2477278 We can stop them together, bury
them in the sand where they belong.

2477311 2479780 So that this planet
can be yours once more.

2479814 2483584 What would you
have us do? Huh?

2485553 2489623 I? I would... would
strike even further north.
2489657 2491525 Then I will go further north.

2491559 2494228 And the further north you go,
the more likely it is you die.
2538205 2543911 You shall be know among us as Usul.
2545713 2549784 Usul. And now, a Fedaykin is a fighter
2558159 2559627 How do you call the, uh...
2568636 2572306 Muad'Dib is wise in the ways of the desert.
2577244 2581115 The constellation that points to the North Star, we call Muad'Dib.
2590991 2595062 Now you are our brother. Mmm.

2692393 2695229 Arrakis is so beautiful
when the sun is low.

2702903 2707408 Where you're from, does water
really fall from the sky?

2709777 2712947 Sometimes it rains
for weeks on Caladan.

2712980 2715249 Where you see sand here,
imagine water.

2718419 2722524 Our castle stands on cliffs
high above the sea.

2722557 2725492 If you dive in,
you can't reach the bottom.

2725527 2729496 - You dive in?
- Yes, it's called swimming.
2729531 2732333 I don't... I don't believe you, Usul.

2750951 2752419 - I love it.
- I hate it.

2767234 2769169 Do you think Stilgar
would teach me?

2774208 2775976 Well, I thought I'd become one,
didn't I?

2780214 2784918 Your blood comes
from Dukes and Great Houses.

2789290 2793294 Here, we're equal,
men and women alike.

2793327 2795496 What we do,
we do for the benefit of all.

2795530 2797898 Well, I'd very much like
to be equal to you.
2814649 2816050 Maybe I'll show you the way.

2921689 2927662 Your orders were to restore
spice production to full capacity.

2927695 2930130 Do you know
what it means if you fail?

2931733 2935637 The Emperor will take spice
out of our control.
2940374 2942677 Or feel mine on your neck.

2973608 2976678 It's been a while since you've
had one of those nightmares.
2981549 2983685 Tell me, what was it about?
2995095 2999032 I'm in the South, and I'm following someone.
3005807 3009511 Millions and millions of people starving to death...

3018118 3021255 You've been exposed
to spice for a long time.

3033433 3035068 We can ask Stilgar
to call it off.

3065499 3069336 Don't try to impress anyone.
You are brave. We all know that.

3078312 3080782 Nothing fancy or you will shame
my teaching.

3080815 3084852 I won't shame you.
I understand.
3084886 3089524 Shai-Hulud decides today if you become Fremen, or if you die.

3530064 3532600 Mm-hmm. Mm-hmm.
I know they do.
3535336 3538005 Our task in the North is nearly done.
3546781 3549116 They will protect him when he comes.
3551786 3555956 The Kwisatz Haderach will be born in the South.
3594695 3596030 The way they look at you.

3601769 3604238 The Fedaykin,
they count your victories.
3604271 3606874 They say you can see the future.
3614048 3617218 I'm a Fedaykin of Sietch Tabr.

3617251 3619954 Yet, we have a Bene Gesserit
among us,

3619987 3621322 fanning the flames
of your legend,

3650317 3652153 She says you should
be coming with us.

3656457 3658425 Because I must continue
fighting in the North,

3658459 3660661 to protect you down
there in the South.

3662429 3666066 She says she can tell
when you lie.

3666100 3669403 Tell her that's because our mother
keeps spreading dangerous tales.
3678846 3681248 She says you're blinded by love,

3681282 3683450 and she reminds you that
you must reserve your hand

3688355 3691325 She's also wondering why
you don't believe in who you are.

3692760 3694695 I believe I matter
to these people.

3696297 3698299 And I believe I'm making
a difference in this war.

3700334 3702069 We're nearly
at the gates of the city.

3702102 3704972 - That's not what she means.
- I know what she means.

3705005 3707341 Do you not think I also feel
the weight of the prophecy?

3709376 3711078 It's a story that you
keep telling,

3711111 3713147 but it's not their story,
it's yours.

3713180 3716383 They deserve to be led
by one of their own.

3716417 3719119 What your people did
to this world is heartbreaking.

3719153 3720821 We gave them something
to hope for.
3835670 3838339 eighty percent of our last crop.

3838372 3842242 My Lord Rabban, you should
not leave the security perimeter.

3842276 3844878 Security perimeter?
The rats are already inside.

3844912 3846548 The Fremen Demon
might be with them.

3897699 3899266 Why do I have to do
everything myself?

4125793 4128696 It's not the first time
we've had frictions with the Fremen.

4137605 4139807 how would you deal
with this prophet?
4146213 4148883 If this Muad'Dib is a religious figure,

4153888 4157324 Repression only makes
a religion flourish.

4157357 4159426 You'll only end up
humiliating yourself.

4161228 4163898 You underestimate
the power of faith.

4167802 4171371 Her Highness proves once again
that she was my most acute student.

4176544 4178311 Prophets get stronger
when they die.

4179981 4182583 Let the conflict
on Arrakis turn into war.

4182617 4185787 You then bring peace.
As a savior.
4197565 4200233 The one who points the way.

4200267 4202436 These are our own
religious patterns, aren't they?

4210477 4212379 An unusual war name
for a Fremen.

4214582 4217685 - What if Paul Atreides were still alive?
- Enough!

4217719 4221856 This must not come out. Even
to your father's ears. Understand?

4225760 4228996 If Paul
is alive, he likely knows the truth.

4229030 4230965 And should
the Great Houses learn

4230998 4234334 that your father was behind
the liquidation of the Atreides,

4234367 4237705 your father will face war
and lose the throne.

4244879 4249016 We are Bene Gesserit.
We don't hope, we plan.
4250383 4254354 Paul is not our only prospect.

4254387 4259392 The Baron's youngest nephew, Feyd-Rautha
Harkonnen, will inherit Arrakis.

4267034 4271371 The question is,
can we control him?
4271404 4272807 And I intend to find out.

4296130 4298699 Would you like
some fresh meat, my darlings?

4302904 4305973 What would
you like? I hear they're big today.

4306007 4310477 Your new blades
for this very special day,
4362830 4364866 I won't die like a fool.
4366067 4368836 No drug for you today, Atreides.

4446247 4448516 I hope your travels
were agreeable.

4448549 4450785 A long way
to come just to watch our prospect
4454855 4456557 These fights are all for show.

4458025 4460628 But we'll get
a good look at him.
4637071 4639039 Why do they not stop the fight?
4788856 4791225 This morning you were a playboy,

4798299 4800301 I ought to drown you
in that tub.
4804104 4806541 I have another gift for you.

4816884 4819153 He has failed
to protect spice production.

4828262 4830864 Free the spice.
I'll make you Emperor.

4851318 4854254 The Emperor helped me
destroy the Atreides.

4855590 4858359 He lent his own army
to the cause.

4860961 4865165 If it came to light, the Great
Houses would rise against him.
4868469 4870904 who will sit on the throne?

4924358 4929062 Will you show me the way out
of this maze, my Lord na-Baron?

4946447 4948750 I'm here to honor
your coming of age.

4948783 4950552 You're not allowed
in this section.
4951686 4953287 How did you get past the guards?

4957491 4959393 May I ask,
what are you doing here?

4961663 4965098 You're not taking part
in your own celebrations?
4978312 4981181 And what makes you say that?
4983718 4986420 I dreamed about you last night.

4993393 4996396 I know your
Bene Gesserit tricks.

4996430 4998700 And what do you know
about the Bene Gesserit?
5071606 5074474 Put your right hand in the box.

5121623 5124826 Respectfully, why didn't you
test him yourself?

5128763 5132366 And based on what happened
between him and his own mother,
5132399 5134936 I didn't expect to be effective.

5134969 5136571 What happened between
him and his mother?

5148950 5151653 we shall know
how to control him.
5172540 5174842 Rid me of this Fremen Demon.
5253420 5255022 Well, it was nice knowing ya.
5282850 5284819 Yeah, I got a meter reading...

5284852 5286854 All
right, guys, worms are on their way.

5286888 5287955 - Watch out for abrasions.
- Get ready to dock.

5441175 5443911 Mmm.
After the Battle of Arrakeen,

5443945 5447447 I was able to negotiate a trip
back home for the survivors.
5460895 5463998 Well, since Muad'Dib's been driving Rabban crazy,

5464031 5468903 the smuggling business
has been quite profitable.

5517118 5520054 Do you realize what you're able
to achieve with 200 men?

5523124 5524658 Duncan said there
were millions of them.
5526327 5528763 Well, what are you waiting for?

5528796 5531999 With thousands of these guys, you
could take control of the entire planet.

5532033 5534068 It's your father's dream.
What are you afraid of?

5546747 5548682 Why is that a bad thing?
Use it.

5550885 5553687 You have the power to avenge
your father, and you're afraid to use it?

5560027 5563964 If I go South, all my visions
lead to horror.

5563998 5567301 Billions of corpses
scattered across the galaxy.

5598332 5600034 What?
Look at him, he's hopeless.

5634368 5636871 No need to be a prophet
to see what's ahead.

5648782 5652353 What will you do when you feel
its breath upon your neck?

5656090 5658359 If you don't want to raise
an army in the South,
5658392 5660027 you may still have an option.

5675409 5677945 I know where your father
hid the family atomics.

5683350 5686153 Every House possesses
an atomic arsenal.
5687522 5689456 I thought ours had been lost.

5691926 5694295 It's huge, Chani.
It could change everything.

5699767 5702937 I could aim the bombs
at the main spice fields.

5704905 5708108 He who can destroy a thing
has the real control of it.

5709843 5711278 So, you can control it
and not us?

5713548 5715349 You promised me
you didn't want power.

5717251 5719253 No matter what I do,
you still don't trust me.

5719286 5722056 'Cause you're a foreigner.
Like your friend.
5735102 5736770 But to the desert, you are.
5741976 5743777 I'm doing this for all of us.

5777044 5779246 Nobody would ever look in there
because it's obvious.

5790958 5792893 Enough to blow up
the whole planet.

5868369 5872072 The 92 original Atreides
family's atomic warheads.

5891593 5895462 Reports from the south
of Arrakis arrive rarely.
5895496 5899199 These are barren, burnt lands hidden by sandstorms
5899233 5901502 which stretch a thousand miles across the equator.
5907474 5911546 Which is why our Bene Gesserit missionaries have been so productive there.
5915082 5918051 Through them, we are receiving reports of a mysterious figure
5923390 5927027 A new Reverend Mother from the North...
5927060 5931165 spreading word of the imminent arrival of the Lisan al-Gaib,
5934301 5937572 With religious fervor rising in the South,
5937605 5941408 and Muad'Dib strangling spice production in the North,
5941442 5944945 everything points to the escalation of war.

6086888 6088590 Soon a man
is going to visit your temple

6088623 6091358 and he may want
you to perform the rites.

6204706 6207542 We're literally melting rock
on their heads.

6207575 6210611 I want to go on the ground.
Prepare my troops.

6210645 6213815 My Lord. I would recommend you
stay inside. There was...
6213848 6215783 Bring his body to my quarters.

6219319 6220988 There was no food
for them on the flight.

6225059 6228295 It's early morning.
What are you doing here?

6264632 6267267 Embarrass
our family one more time...

6304672 6307108 They didn't even
engage on the ground,

6344912 6347414 only leaders
are allowed to speak.

6348716 6351586 - You must take my place.
- I can't do that.

6351619 6354522 It is a good time
to cross blades with me.
6354555 6357859 I am weak. I am an easy kill, Muad'Dib.
6357892 6359861 I'd rather cut off my own hand.
6359894 6362630 We need you. We need the Lisan al-Gaib to lead our people.

6362663 6364599 You know what I think
of all that, Stilgar.

6364632 6367034 I don't care what you believe.
I believe.
6387622 6389757 They just went back to reload.

6391692 6393027 We're moving everyone
to the South.

6393060 6394962 I'll stay behind
and cover your retreat.

6394996 6397430 - What are you talking about?
- Chani, I can't go with you.

6399734 6401736 - I'll stay, too.
- Nobody stays but me.

6401769 6404205 - Paul. - That's an order,
Gurney Halleck! Go South!
6462229 6466167 You cannot see the future without seeing the past.
6468536 6472974 To unlock your mind, you need to drink the Water of Life...
6479647 6483050 A good hunter always climbs the highest dune before his hunt.
6498666 6500701 You must drink the Water of Life.

6526027 6527962 The world has made
choices for us.
6533067 6534835 If I go South, I might lose you.

6541008 6543310 Not as long
as you stay who you are.
6550918 6552920 I'll cross the storms with you.

6563230 6565933 And then I will do
what must be done.

6595830 6598299 They've gone
South to hide in the storms.
6603137 6604872 Send this message to the Baron.

6604905 6607208 The North is liberated
and secured.

6625893 6629263 You killed nine of my men
with one single blade.

6634702 6636937 I already know
everything I need to know.
6772139 6776043 Now that you can see our past,
6807308 6810110 you are not prepared for what is to come.
6811945 6815249 You'll now learn the truth about our family.
6815282 6818852 And it will hurt you to the core.

6899734 6902469 His vital signs are so low,
they can't be detected.
6904004 6905506 What did you do to him?

6906974 6909076 No, not that.
Why would he do that?

6919253 6922657 Chani, his body is fighting the
poison and he needs your help.
6926393 6928061 You did this to your own son!

6931231 6934602 Chani, you might not believe in
the prophecy, but you're a part of it.

6936370 6939072 You and your lies.
Why would you do this?

7097899 7101703 I see possible futures.
All at once.
7102870 7106406 Our enemies are all around us.

7106440 7108776 And in so many futures,
they prevail.
7109711 7111579 But I do see a way.
7112780 7115182 There is a narrow way through.
7142577 7145379 You are the daughter of Baron Vladimir Harkonnen.

7155723 7158893 I didn't know myself,
until I took the worm's poison.
7172472 7174542 So this is how we'll survive.

7277845 7280748 Stilgar, you can stop this.
Do you hear me?
7280782 7282482 You have the power to stop this.

7284018 7285887 You are not allowed
to speak inside the circle.

7285920 7287588 If you want to speak,
you know what to do.

7303538 7306473 This prophecy
is how they enslave us!
7310477 7311913 This is none of your business.

7311946 7313948 Rabban Harkonnen himself
killed my family.

7313981 7315950 He gave me this scar
to remember him by.
7315983 7318019 This is all of my business.
7367168 7369469 If you wish to share your voice,

7369502 7372439 you must take his place
by defeating him

7372472 7374876 and returning his water
to the well.

7374909 7378478 You think I'm stupid enough to
deprive myself of the best of us?

7428195 7430430 But you think
you could have a chance.

7521155 7523224 This is my father's
ducal signet.
7619120 7620721 Was this all upon your advice?

7622823 7625860 Did you counsel my father
to exterminate the Atreides?

7625893 7629230 Of course I did. Why else
would it have happened?

7629263 7631699 You tried to sacrifice
an entire bloodline.
7631732 7633801 And I was right to do it.
7633834 7636971 The Kwisatz Haderach is a form of power
7637004 7639240 that our world has not yet seen.

7645846 7648916 They were promising, but they
were becoming dangerously defiant.

7648949 7652386 Their bloodline
had to be terminated.

7652419 7654889 That is why we have put
many bloodlines at work.

7659193 7661128 And if he defeats
Feyd-Rautha, my father...

7661162 7665366 Your father will lose the
throne no matter who prevails.

7665399 7668402 But there is one way your
family can remain in power

7668435 7671872 and, through you, the
continuation of our stewardship.

7677978 7680681 You've been preparing me
my whole life, Reverend Mother.

7682983 7685286 You're heading north
with the others?

7687288 7689990 I follow my leaders. If
fighting goes north, I go north.

7690024 7691392 Paul didn't have
a choice, Chani.
7691425 7694061 I won't be fighting for him.
7699266 7701101 I came to wish you best of luck.

7705906 7707474 but it seems
you've won your battle.

7778879 7780981 I brought spice production
under control.

7786887 7789591 Send messages
to the Great Houses.

7789624 7793861 Tell them that Arrakis
is under Sardaukar attack.

7793894 7796564 Tell them, their future
hangs in the balance.
7823924 7826427 When the storm hits this ridge,

7826460 7828929 Gurney will open
the way for you, Stilgar,

7828962 7831231 so you can enter
the basin from the West

7833635 7835436 Chani, I want you
and your Fedaykin
7835469 7836970 to then attack from the East,

7840007 7842109 I'll strike from the
North, head on,

7844244 7847081 And I'll serve Arrakeen
for dessert.

7847114 7849283 Remember,
I need the Emperor alive.
7921221 7926059 do you have any idea who this Muad'Dib could be?

7926093 7929062 Some fanatic, your Majesty.
That's all we know.

7944746 7947749 Or he went hiding
in the Southern storms

7953353 7955757 threatens the integrity
of our shields.

7955790 7957991 We recommend
going back into orbit.

7958025 7959993 Well, the mountains will
protect us from most of it,

7971573 7974274 Well, the entire region
is uninhabitable.

7986621 7989156 I swear to you, I wasn't
aware of any of this.
8601869 8603637 Look who's back from the dead.
8617985 8621322 For my Duke, and my friends.

8692993 8695462 Gurney, it's time.
Bring the prisoners.

8734301 8736303 I will love you
as long as I breathe.

8748516 8750985 There is a massed armada
in orbit.

8754388 8758158 You're facing
a full invasion, Fremen.

8758192 8761295 How can you be so sure
the Great Houses are here for me?

8767268 8771573 They may be curious to hear my
side of the story, don't you think?

8771606 8776176 I am Paul Atreides, son of
Leto Atreides, Duke of Arrakis.
8779514 8781882 Send a warning to all ships.

8781915 8785853 If the Great Houses attack, our
atomics will obliterate all spice fields.

8787354 8790057 - You're out of your mind.
- He's bluffing.

8790090 8792159 Consider what you're
about to do, Paul Atreides.

8805906 8809476 As a servant of the Imperium,
you will bow at my feet.

8809511 8813113 Your feet? You'll be lucky
to keep your head.

8816350 8817985 I'll take the hand
of your daughter.

8822524 8825159 And we will rule together
over the Empire.

8839039 8840608 You have to answer
for my father.
8848248 8851985 Do you know why I killed him?

8855255 8857224 who believed
in the rules of the heart.

8858593 8860494 But the heart
is not meant to rule.
8865533 8869203 your father was a weak man.

8903070 8906073 Do not stain your hands
on this animal.
8927729 8930230 Why does he take such risks?

8956423 8959727 I'm happy
to finally meet you, cousin.

8966266 8971171 Well, you wouldn't be
the first relative I've killed.
8973775 8976611 May thy knife chip and shatter.
8980047 8984184 May thy knife chip and shatter.

9052820 9056189 Any special attention
for the pet?
9243044 9244946 The life debt has been paid.

9244979 9246814 Spare my father now and
I will be your willing bride.

9340942 9344512 My Lord,
the Great Houses have answered.

9344545 9346446 They refuse
to honor your ascendancy.

9397031 9399533 Your brother attacks
the Great Houses.

subtitles.author: tedi
lines: 59794 63430 The battle for Arrakis took everyone by surprise.
76878 79413 By morning, the Atreides were no more.
99801 102302 Since that night, my father has not been the same.
106406 109811 His inaction is difficult for me to accept.
109844 112747 For, I know he loved Duke Leto Atreides like a son.
125359 128328 This would not be the first time the Harkonnens have done his dirty work.

136871 139406 In the shadows of Arrakis
lie many secrets...
141876 144277 but the darkest of them all may remain.
168503 170303 Shouldn't you go back to the stars,
174742 177912 I'm afraid I won't have enough time to fix things before your coming.

540174 543611 Never stand with your back
towards the open.

543644 545279 How many times do I have
to tell you that, huh?

559326 563764 [grunts] They do not usually
venture this deep.

563798 565633 They wanna make sure
no Atreides escaped.

565666 568102 [Stilgar chuckles]
You think too much of yourself.

568135 570871 No, no,
we are in the deep desert.

573774 576110 They were here for us,
not for you.

579113 582183 I'm taking you somewhere
they will never find us.

601669 605739 It's full of chemicals, but good
enough for cooling systems.
666934 668936 [Paul] No, no, no. I'll do it.

735803 737905 Now that the spice fields
have been secured,

737938 741175 I strongly recommend bringing
all troops out of Fremen territories.

741208 743077 We're losing too many men
to the desert.

746113 749083 - I beg your pardon?
- We're losing men to rats.

752186 754321 Fremen!
I can't confirm, my Lord.

754355 756190 Communications are hectic
in the open sands.

756223 759093 Your orders were to control
the whole planet.

761095 763998 - We are.
- I see only half of it.

765266 768102 the South is uninhabitable,
my Lord.
770437 772306 May I suggest you get some rest?

775276 777579 Kill them! Kill them!
Kill them all!
828362 829597 He's asking why we're so late.

841576 845112 - Thanks.
- [Stilgar] Stay close to me. Hmm?

896263 899133 - [angry, indistinct shouting in Chakobsa]
- [Stilgar speaks Chakobsa]

1021589 1024191 Look how your Bene Gesserit
propaganda has taken root.

1027227 1029162 Some of them already think
I'm their messiah.

1039406 1042409 If they follow me, we can
disrupt spice production.

1042442 1044278 That's the only way
I can get to the Emperor.

1045880 1047481 Your father didn't believe
in revenge.

1094596 1096296 [Paul] There is spice
in the food.

1185285 1190792 None of us, even dying of
thirst, would ever drink this water.
1201435 1204639 We have a thousand such places.
1209043 1213648 the Lisan al-Gaib will change the face of Arrakis.

1213681 1216316 He will bring back the trees.
He will bring back...

1234702 1238438 Never give your water away,
not even for the dead. Hmm?
1241341 1242744 Why are you showing me this?
1248482 1251786 The mother of the Lisan al-Gaib will be a Reverend Mother.

1257424 1259627 [whispers]
You want me to take her place?

1280047 1282083 and you have no purpose
to serve.

1282116 1286087 What else is left to do then but
to return your water to the well?
1294427 1295830 I think you should feel honored.

1295863 1297899 Well, it was a choice
between this or death,

1297932 1299767 so, you know, forgive me
if I'm not flattered.

1301936 1303638 How does one become
a Reverend Mother?

1303671 1305640 It's different from one culture
to another.
1305673 1307575 Here on Arrakis, I have no idea.

1314115 1316017 Reverend Mothers are tasked
with holding the memories

1316050 1317885 of all the Reverend Mothers
that came before them,

1317919 1321088 so I'll be given centuries
of pain and sorrow.

1396197 1398132 What are you guys
laughing about?
1404572 1405773 You don't believe in all this?

1411478 1414782 Southern tribes believe a messiah
will come to deliver us from evil.
1414815 1416884 You don't believe in the Lisan al-Gaib?

1421622 1424725 You want to control people,
you tell them a messiah will come.

1424759 1428495 - Mm-hmm.
- Then they'll wait for centuries.

1444845 1447949 He's from the South.
You didn't notice his accent?

1480715 1483551 [whispers] I must not fear.
Fear is the mind-killer.

1483584 1486554 Fear, the little death
that brings total obliteration.
1486587 1488656 I will face my fear. I will...

1655022 1657892 My mother was trained
to do that.

1657925 1660828 Poison transmutation is something
advanced Bene Gesserit can do.

1676511 1679747 Let me fight beside you.
That's all I'm asking.
1745379 1749383 Only one step remains and you will become the Kwisatz Haderach.
1753220 1754855 You must do what I did.

1754888 1758192 You must drink
the Water of Life.

1758225 1761895 And your mind, it's gon... it's
gonna open and you will see.

1772940 1777579 [Stilgar] If you wanna fight
with us, first thing, you must learn
1777612 1779547 to be one with the desert.

1781181 1784552 So, here is a tent
and enough food.

1784586 1789323 I want you to cross
that small erg and come back.

1791892 1793360 You know how to use
a paracompass?

1799099 1801503 Uh, beside the worms
and the Harkonnens,

1805306 1808876 Centipedes are very nasty.
Not the big ones.

1810578 1814248 But the little ones, you have
to worry about. And... Oh!

1816950 1820387 Don't ever,
ever listen to the jinn.

1837137 1841175 Really, be careful.
They are demons.

1844345 1846213 But it's true.
Don't listen to them.

1935570 1938005 [Chani] You sandwalk
like a drunk lizard.

1941241 1942744 Yeah, I'm doing
pretty good so far.

1942777 1945345 Yeah, well, you're not even
in worm territory yet.

1964364 1966066 [Chani] You have to break up
your rhythm.

1972439 1975309 [Paul] Now, that's interesting
because in the filmbooks I've studied,

1975342 1978613 the anthropologists say, in order to
properly sandwalk, you actually have...

2013080 2016416 You know, I'm the only one who believes
you're gonna make it until summer?

2016450 2018218 Everyone else thinks
you won't make it two weeks.

2019587 2021054 If you wanna follow us
in the desert,

2021088 2022524 you need to know
how windtraps work.

2024391 2026661 They're simple, but they
require constant attention.

2026694 2030163 Uh, this right here,
it captures the moisture

2030197 2031633 and then it carries it
into that pocket.
2032734 2035803 Uh, and these are the filters.

2035837 2037505 They need to be changed
every three days.
2045112 2046614 Stop looking at me like that.

2053721 2055690 He will be back soon.
Don't worry.

2059259 2062730 You're right. If we want
to protect your brother,

2062764 2065867 we need all the Fremen
to believe in the prophecy.
2070437 2074709 We must convert the non-believers one by one.
2076844 2079379 We need to start with the weaker ones.

2109476 2111879 [Fedaykin fighter whispers]
Hey, get out of here. Go.

2250685 2251953 [Fedaykin fighter and Chani
shouting in Chakobsa]

2334936 2337104 [Paul] Its shield will
only open when it fires.

2337138 2338806 [Chani] I know that. What
do you think I'm trying to do?

2338840 2341843 [Paul] I'll trigger it.
On my signal. Be ready.

2439974 2441809 Who taught you
to fight like that?

2448015 2451152 They were massacred.
Alongside my father.

2456724 2459894 You've been fighting
the Harkonnens for decades.

2459927 2462495 My family's been fighting them
for centuries.

2462530 2467500 I know everything about them.
Their habits, their ways of thinking.

2467535 2468769 You know everything
about the desert.

2468803 2472506 You harness
the very power of it.

2472540 2477278 We can stop them together, bury
them in the sand where they belong.

2477311 2479780 So that this planet
can be yours once more.

2479814 2483584 [deeply inhales] What would you
have us do? Huh?

2485553 2489623 I? I would... [sighs] would
strike even further north.
2489657 2491525 Then I will go further north.

2491559 2494228 And the further north you go,
the more likely it is you die.
2538205 2543911 You shall be know among us as Usul.
2545713 2549784 [Stilgar] Usul. And now, a Fedaykin is a fighter
2558159 2559627 How do you call the, uh...
2568636 2572306 Muad'Dib is wise in the ways of the desert.
2577244 2581115 The constellation that points to the North Star, we call Muad'Dib.
2590991 2595062 Now you are our brother. Mmm.

2692393 2695229 Arrakis is so beautiful
when the sun is low.

2702903 2707408 Where you're from, does water
really fall from the sky?

2709777 2712947 Sometimes it rains
for weeks on Caladan.

2712980 2715249 Where you see sand here,
imagine water.

2718419 2722524 Our castle stands on cliffs
high above the sea.

2722557 2725492 If you dive in,
you can't reach the bottom.

2725527 2729496 - [Chani] You dive in?
- Yes, it's called swimming.
2729531 2732333 [laughs] I don't... I don't believe you, Usul.

2750951 2752419 - I love it.
- I hate it.

2767234 2769169 Do you think Stilgar
would teach me?

2770938 2774174 [Chani laughs]
No. Only Fremen ride worms.

2774208 2775976 Well, I thought I'd become one,
didn't I?

2780214 2784918 Your blood comes
from Dukes and Great Houses.

2789290 2793294 Here, we're equal,
men and women alike.

2793327 2795496 What we do,
we do for the benefit of all.

2795530 2797898 Well, I'd very much like
to be equal to you.
2814649 2816050 Maybe I'll show you the way.

2917284 2921656 [Baron Harkonnen]
Fremen attacks on your watch.

2921689 2927662 Your orders were to restore
spice production to full capacity.

2927695 2930130 Do you know
what it means if you fail?

2931733 2935637 The Emperor will take spice
out of our control.

2940374 2942677 [Baron Harkonnen]
Or feel mine on your neck.

2973608 2976678 It's been a while since you've
had one of those nightmares.

2981549 2983685 [Chani] Tell me,
what was it about?
2995095 2999032 I'm in the South, and I'm following someone.
3005807 3009511 Millions and millions of people starving to death...

3018118 3021255 [Chani] You've been exposed
to spice for a long time.

3033433 3035068 We can ask Stilgar
to call it off.

3065499 3069336 Don't try to impress anyone.
You are brave. We all know that.

3078312 3080782 Nothing fancy or you will shame
my teaching.

3080815 3084852 I won't shame you.
I understand.
3084886 3089524 Shai-Hulud decides today if you become Fremen, or if you die.

3530064 3532600 [Jessica] Mm-hmm. Mm-hmm.
I know they do.
3535336 3538005 Our task in the North is nearly done.
3546781 3549116 They will protect him when he comes.
3551786 3555956 The Kwisatz Haderach will be born in the South.
3594695 3596030 The way they look at you.

3601769 3604238 The Fedaykin,
they count your victories.
3604271 3606874 They say you can see the future.
3614048 3617218 I'm a Fedaykin of Sietch Tabr.

3617251 3619954 Yet, we have a Bene Gesserit
among us,

3619987 3621322 fanning the flames
of your legend,

3650317 3652153 She says you should
be coming with us.

3656457 3658425 Because I must continue
fighting in the North,

3658459 3660661 to protect you down
there in the South.

3662429 3666066 She says she can tell
when you lie.

3666100 3669403 Tell her that's because our mother
keeps spreading dangerous tales.
3678846 3681248 She says you're blinded by love,

3681282 3683450 and she reminds you that
you must reserve your hand

3688355 3691325 She's also wondering why
you don't believe in who you are.

3692760 3694695 I believe I matter
to these people.

3696297 3698299 And I believe I'm making
a difference in this war.

3700334 3702069 We're nearly
at the gates of the city.

3702102 3704972 - That's not what she means.
- I know what she means.

3705005 3707341 Do you not think I also feel
the weight of the prophecy?

3709376 3711078 It's a story that you
keep telling,

3711111 3713147 but it's not their story,
it's yours.

3713180 3716383 They deserve to be led
by one of their own.

3716417 3719119 What your people did
to this world is heartbreaking.

3719153 3720821 We gave them something
to hope for.
3835670 3838339 eighty percent of our last crop.

3838372 3842242 My Lord Rabban, you should
not leave the security perimeter.

3842276 3844878 Security perimeter?
The rats are already inside.

3844912 3846548 The Fremen Demon
might be with them.

3848315 3848949 [Harkonnen soldier]
We're tracking them, my Lord.

3897699 3899266 [Rabban] Why do I have to do
everything myself?

4125793 4128696 [Princess Irulan] It's not the first time
we've had frictions with the Fremen.

4137605 4139807 how would you deal
with this prophet?
4146213 4148883 If this Muad'Dib is a religious figure,

4153888 4157324 Repression only makes
a religion flourish.

4157357 4159426 You'll only end up
humiliating yourself.

4161228 4163898 You underestimate
the power of faith.

4167802 4171371 Her Highness proves once again
that she was my most acute student.

4176544 4178311 Prophets get stronger
when they die.

4179981 4182583 Let the conflict
on Arrakis turn into war.

4182617 4185787 You then bring peace.
As a savior.
4197565 4200233 The one who points the way.

4200267 4202436 These are our own
religious patterns, aren't they?

4210477 4212379 An unusual war name
for a Fremen.

4214582 4217685 - What if Paul Atreides were still alive?
- [distorted] Enough!

4217719 4221856 This must not come out. Even
to your father's ears. Understand?

4225760 4228996 [Reverend Mother Mohiam] If Paul
is alive, he likely knows the truth.

4229030 4230965 And should
the Great Houses learn

4230998 4234334 that your father was behind
the liquidation of the Atreides,

4234367 4237705 your father will face war
and lose the throne.

4244879 4249016 We are Bene Gesserit.
We don't hope, we plan.
4250383 4254354 Paul is not our only prospect.

4254387 4259392 The Baron's youngest nephew, Feyd-Rautha
Harkonnen, will inherit Arrakis.

4267034 4271371 The question is,
can we control him?
4271404 4272807 And I intend to find out.

4296130 4298699 [Feyd-Rautha] Would you like
some fresh meat, my darlings?

4302904 4305973 [Feyd-Rautha] What would
you like? I hear they're big today.

4306007 4310477 Your new blades
for this very special day,

4362830 4364866 [Lanville]
I won't die like a fool.
4366067 4368836 No drug for you today, Atreides.

4444178 4446213 [Lady Margot Fenring]
Welcome to Giedi Prime, sisters.

4446247 4448516 I hope your travels
were agreeable.

4448549 4450785 [Bene Gesserit sister 1] A long way
to come just to watch our prospect
4454855 4456557 These fights are all for show.

4458025 4460628 But we'll get
a good look at him.

4637071 4639039 [Bene Gesserit sister 2]
Why do they not stop the fight?
4788856 4791225 This morning you were a playboy,

4798299 4800301 I ought to drown you
in that tub.
4804104 4806541 I have another gift for you.

4816884 4819153 [Baron Harkonnen] He has failed
to protect spice production.

4828262 4830864 Free the spice.
I'll make you Emperor.

4851318 4854254 The Emperor helped me
destroy the Atreides.

4855590 4858359 He lent his own army
to the cause.

4860961 4865165 If it came to light, the Great
Houses would rise against him.
4868469 4870904 who will sit on the throne?

4924358 4929062 Will you show me the way out
of this maze, my Lord na-Baron?

4946447 4948750 I'm here to honor
your coming of age.

4948783 4950552 You're not allowed
in this section.
4951686 4953287 How did you get past the guards?

4957491 4959393 [distorted] May I ask,
what are you doing here?

4961663 4965098 You're not taking part
in your own celebrations?

4978312 4981181 [Lady Margot Fenring] And
what makes you say that?
4983718 4986420 I dreamed about you last night.
4986453 4988155 [Lady Margot Fenring] A pleasant dream, I hope.

4993393 4996396 I know your
Bene Gesserit tricks.

4996430 4998700 And what do you know
about the Bene Gesserit?

5047582 5053053 [Lady Margot Fenring whispers]
Come. To. Me.

5071606 5074474 [Lady Margot Fenring whispers]
Put your right hand in the box.

5089691 5093126 [Lady Margot Fenring] A
sociopath. Of high intelligence.

5102537 5104137 [Reverend Mother Mohiam]
Can he be redeemed?

5104171 5105640 [Lady Margot Fenring]
He can be controlled.

5121623 5124826 Respectfully, why didn't you
test him yourself?

5128763 5132366 And based on what happened
between him and his own mother,
5132399 5134936 I didn't expect to be effective.

5134969 5136571 What happened between
him and his mother?

5148950 5151653 we shall know
how to control him.
5172540 5174842 Rid me of this Fremen Demon.

5253420 5255022 [man 1] Well, it was nice
knowing ya.

5282850 5284819 [man 2 through comms]
Yeah, I got a meter reading...

5284852 5286854 [man 1 through comms] All
right, guys, worms are on their way.

5286888 5287955 - [man 2] Watch out for abrasions.
- [man 1] Get ready to dock.

5441175 5443911 [Gurney] Mmm.
After the Battle of Arrakeen,

5443945 5447447 I was able to negotiate a trip
back home for the survivors.
5460895 5463998 Well, since Muad'Dib's been driving Rabban crazy,

5464031 5468903 the smuggling business
has been quite profitable.

5517118 5520054 Do you realize what you're able
to achieve with 200 men?

5523124 5524658 Duncan said there
were millions of them.
5526327 5528763 Well, what are you waiting for?

5528796 5531999 With thousands of these guys, you
could take control of the entire planet.

5532033 5534068 It's your father's dream.
What are you afraid of?

5546747 5548682 Why is that a bad thing?
Use it.

5550885 5553687 You have the power to avenge
your father, and you're afraid to use it?

5560027 5563964 If I go South, all my visions
lead to horror.

5563998 5567301 Billions of corpses
scattered across the galaxy.

5598332 5600034 What? [chuckles]
Look at him, he's hopeless.

5634368 5636871 No need to be a prophet
to see what's ahead.

5648782 5652353 What will you do when you feel
its breath upon your neck?

5656090 5658359 If you don't want to raise
an army in the South,
5658392 5660027 you may still have an option.

5675409 5677945 I know where your father
hid the family atomics.

5683350 5686153 [Paul] Every House possesses
an atomic arsenal.
5687522 5689456 I thought ours had been lost.

5691926 5694295 It's huge, Chani.
It could change everything.

5699767 5702937 I could aim the bombs
at the main spice fields.

5704905 5708108 He who can destroy a thing
has the real control of it.

5709843 5711278 So, you can control it
and not us?

5713548 5715349 You promised me
you didn't want power.

5717251 5719253 No matter what I do,
you still don't trust me.

5719286 5722056 'Cause you're a foreigner.
Like your friend.
5735102 5736770 But to the desert, you are.
5741976 5743777 I'm doing this for all of us.

5777044 5779246 Nobody would ever look in there
because it's obvious.

5790958 5792893 Enough to blow up
the whole planet.

5868369 5872072 The 92 original Atreides
family's atomic warheads.

5891593 5895462 Reports from the south
of Arrakis arrive rarely.
5895496 5899199 These are barren, burnt lands hidden by sandstorms
5899233 5901502 which stretch a thousand miles across the equator.
5907474 5911546 Which is why our Bene Gesserit missionaries have been so productive there.
5915082 5918051 Through them, we are receiving reports of a mysterious figure
5923390 5927027 A new Reverend Mother from the North...
5927060 5931165 spreading word of the imminent arrival of the Lisan al-Gaib,
5934301 5937572 With religious fervor rising in the South,
5937605 5941408 and Muad'Dib strangling spice production in the North,
5941442 5944945 everything points to the escalation of war.

6086888 6088590 Soon a man
is going to visit your temple

6088623 6091358 and he may want
you to perform the rites.

6204706 6207542 We're literally melting rock
on their heads.

6207575 6210611 I want to go on the ground.
Prepare my troops.

6210645 6213815 My Lord. I would recommend you
stay inside. There was... [chokes]
6213848 6215783 Bring his body to my quarters.

6219319 6220988 There was no food
for them on the flight.

6225059 6228295 It's early morning.
What are you doing here?

6264632 6267267 [Baron Harkonnen] Embarrass
our family one more time...

6304672 6307108 [Stilgar] They didn't even
engage on the ground,

6344912 6347414 only leaders
are allowed to speak.

6348716 6351586 - You must take my place.
- I can't do that.

6351619 6354522 It is a good time
to cross blades with me.
6354555 6357859 I am weak. I am an easy kill, Muad'Dib.
6357892 6359861 I'd rather cut off my own hand.
6359894 6362630 We need you. We need the Lisan al-Gaib to lead our people.

6362663 6364599 You know what I think
of all that, Stilgar.

6364632 6367034 I don't care what you believe.
I believe.
6387622 6389757 They just went back to reload.

6391692 6393027 We're moving everyone
to the South.

6393060 6394962 I'll stay behind
and cover your retreat.

6394996 6397430 - What are you talking about?
- Chani, I can't go with you.

6399734 6401736 - [Gurney] I'll stay, too.
- Nobody stays but me.

6401769 6404205 - [Gurney] Paul. - That's an order,
Gurney Halleck! Go South!
6462229 6466167 You cannot see the future without seeing the past.
6468536 6472974 To unlock your mind, you need to drink the Water of Life...
6479647 6483050 [Jamis] A good hunter always climbs the highest dune before his hunt.
6498666 6500701 [Jessica] You must drink the Water of Life.

6526027 6527962 The world has made
choices for us.
6533067 6534835 If I go South, I might lose you.

6541008 6543310 Not as long
as you stay who you are.
6550918 6552920 I'll cross the storms with you.

6563230 6565933 And then I will do
what must be done.

6595830 6598299 [Feyd-Rautha] They've gone
South to hide in the storms.
6603137 6604872 Send this message to the Baron.

6604905 6607208 The North is liberated
and secured.

6625893 6629263 You killed nine of my men
with one single blade.

6634702 6636937 I already know
everything I need to know.
6772139 6776043 [ancient voice] Now that you can see our past,
6807308 6810110 you are not prepared for what is to come.
6811945 6815249 You'll now learn the truth about our family.
6815282 6818852 And it will hurt you to the core.

6899734 6902469 His vital signs are so low,
they can't be detected.
6904004 6905506 What did you do to him?

6906974 6909076 No, not that.
Why would he do that?

6919253 6922657 Chani, his body is fighting the
poison and he needs your help.
6926393 6928061 You did this to your own son!

6931231 6934602 Chani, you might not believe in
the prophecy, but you're a part of it.

6936370 6939072 You and your lies.
Why would you do this?

7097899 7101703 I see possible futures.
All at once.
7102870 7106406 Our enemies are all around us.

7106440 7108776 And in so many futures,
they prevail.
7109711 7111579 But I do see a way.
7112780 7115182 There is a narrow way through.
7142577 7145379 You are the daughter of Baron Vladimir Harkonnen.

7155723 7158893 I didn't know myself,
until I took the worm's poison.
7172472 7174542 So this is how we'll survive.

7277845 7280748 Stilgar, you can stop this.
Do you hear me?
7280782 7282482 You have the power to stop this.

7284018 7285887 You are not allowed
to speak inside the circle.

7285920 7287588 If you want to speak,
you know what to do.

7303538 7306473 This prophecy
is how they enslave us!
7310477 7311913 This is none of your business.

7311946 7313948 Rabban Harkonnen himself
killed my family.

7313981 7315950 He gave me this scar
to remember him by.
7315983 7318019 This is all of my business.
7367168 7369469 If you wish to share your voice,

7369502 7372439 you must take his place
by defeating him

7372472 7374876 and returning his water
to the well.

7374909 7378478 You think I'm stupid enough to
deprive myself of the best of us?

7428195 7430430 But you think
you could have a chance.

7521155 7523224 This is my father's
ducal signet.
7619120 7620721 Was this all upon your advice?

7622823 7625860 Did you counsel my father
to exterminate the Atreides?

7625893 7629230 Of course I did. Why else
would it have happened?

7629263 7631699 You tried to sacrifice
an entire bloodline.
7631732 7633801 And I was right to do it.
7633834 7636971 The Kwisatz Haderach is a form of power
7637004 7639240 that our world has not yet seen.

7645846 7648916 They were promising, but they
were becoming dangerously defiant.

7648949 7652386 Their bloodline
had to be terminated.

7652419 7654889 That is why we have put
many bloodlines at work.

7659193 7661128 And if he defeats
Feyd-Rautha, my father...

7661162 7665366 Your father will lose the
throne no matter who prevails.

7665399 7668402 But there is one way your
family can remain in power

7668435 7671872 and, through you, the
continuation of our stewardship.

7677978 7680681 You've been preparing me
my whole life, Reverend Mother.

7682983 7685286 You're heading north
with the others?

7687288 7689990 I follow my leaders. If
fighting goes north, I go north.

7690024 7691392 Paul didn't have
a choice, Chani.
7691425 7694061 I won't be fighting for him.
7699266 7701101 I came to wish you best of luck.

7705906 7707474 but it seems
you've won your battle.

7778879 7780981 I brought spice production
under control.

7786887 7789591 Send messages
to the Great Houses.

7789624 7793861 Tell them that Arrakis
is under Sardaukar attack.

7793894 7796564 Tell them, their future
hangs in the balance.

7823924 7826427 [Paul] When the storm
hits this ridge,

7826460 7828929 Gurney will open
the way for you, Stilgar,

7828962 7831231 so you can enter
the basin from the West

7833635 7835436 Chani, I want you
and your Fedaykin
7835469 7836970 to then attack from the East,

7840007 7842109 I'll strike from the
North, head on,

7844244 7847081 And I'll serve Arrakeen
for dessert.

7847114 7849283 Remember,
I need the Emperor alive.
7921221 7926059 do you have any idea who this Muad'Dib could be?

7926093 7929062 Some fanatic, your Majesty.
That's all we know.

7944746 7947749 Or he went hiding
in the Southern storms

7953353 7955757 threatens the integrity
of our shields.

7955790 7957991 We recommend
going back into orbit.

7958025 7959993 Well, the mountains will
protect us from most of it,

7971573 7974274 Well, the entire region
is uninhabitable.

7986621 7989156 I swear to you, I wasn't
aware of any of this.
8601869 8603637 Look who's back from the dead.
8617985 8621322 For my Duke, and my friends.

8692993 8695462 Gurney, it's time.
Bring the prisoners.

8734301 8736303 I will love you
as long as I breathe.

8748516 8750985 There is a massed armada
in orbit.

8754388 8758158 You're facing
a full invasion, Fremen.

8758192 8761295 [Paul] How can you be so sure
the Great Houses are here for me?

8767268 8771573 They may be curious to hear my
side of the story, don't you think?

8771606 8776176 I am Paul Atreides, son of
Leto Atreides, Duke of Arrakis.
8779514 8781882 Send a warning to all ships.

8781915 8785853 If the Great Houses attack, our
atomics will obliterate all spice fields.

8787354 8790057 - You're out of your mind.
- He's bluffing.

8790090 8792159 Consider what you're
about to do, Paul Atreides.

8805906 8809476 As a servant of the Imperium,
you will bow at my feet.

8809511 8813113 Your feet? You'll be lucky
to keep your head.

8816350 8817985 I'll take the hand
of your daughter.

8822524 8825159 And we will rule together
over the Empire.

8839039 8840608 You have to answer
for my father.
8848248 8851985 Do you know why I killed him?

8855255 8857224 who believed
in the rules of the heart.

8858593 8860494 But the heart
is not meant to rule.
8865533 8869203 your father was a weak man.

8903070 8906073 Do not stain your hands
on this animal.
8927729 8930230 Why does he take such risks?

8956423 8959727 I'm happy
to finally meet you, cousin.

8966266 8971171 Well, you wouldn't be
the first relative I've killed.
8973775 8976611 May thy knife chip and shatter.

8980047 8984184 [chuckles softly]
May thy knife chip and shatter.

9052820 9056189 Any special attention
for the pet?
9243044 9244946 The life debt has been paid.

9244979 9246814 Spare my father now and
I will be your willing bride.

9340942 9344512 My Lord,
the Great Houses have answered.

9344545 9346446 They refuse
to honor your ascendancy.

9397031 9399533 Your brother attacks
the Great Houses.

subtitles.author: Blu-Duaine
lines: 4922 11929 Power over Spice is power over all
370287 372414 The rats are calling a worm.
948282 950909 They don't know what they're saying.

966425 969386 I need your guidance
with the two foreigners.
970721 972723 Give them back to the desert.

980814 983859 Stilgar, your faith is
playing tricks on you.

984109 987404 The Lisan al-Gaib has not
shown his face yet!
991950 995037 He killed Jamis in a fair fight.
999583 1001919 He will quickly learn our ways.
1003462 1007716 I'm ready to pledge my life for him.
1009051 1012387 The desert will handle his fate.
1098098 1100309 He'll look pretty with blue eyes.

1103812 1106523 He deserves our respect.
He's a good fighter.
1114698 1117492 To the well, our water we return.
1465632 1468343 If she's stupid enough to drink poison.
1495662 1498916 Here is the Water of Life.
1621246 1622998 You saw it with your own eyes!

1624791 1629296 The Mother of the Lisan al-Gaib
shall survive the Holy Poison.

1646897 1649441 Arrakis must be freed
by its own people!
1674508 1676927 I'm here to learn your ways.

1689356 1693986 The Mahdi is too humble
to say He is the Mahdi.
1694736 1697239 Even more reason to know He is!
1739948 1743076 Kwisatz Haderach, show us the way.
1851602 1853687 He doesn't know how to cross.
1853979 1856481 Stilgar is going to get him killed.
1856982 1858859 What is he trying to prove?

1861945 1865199 "The Prophet shall know
the ways of the desert."
1872372 1874499 I think it's for the best.
1881882 1884468 He's not like the other strangers.

2421797 2425676 He saw it coming,
and he saved her life.
2500375 2503003 But the others will keep going.

2504129 2506965 And they won't stop
until the Fremen are free.

3499708 3503170 Shai-Hulud shall bow
to the Boy from the Outer World.
3503378 3505589 Bless the Maker and His works.

3506423 3510469 Will not Shai-Hulud know the Mahdi
when He comes?
3566525 3568944 Will you always be with me?
3729938 3732399 Reverend Mother, we have to go!
3788872 3790874 They're the Guardians of the South.

3791208 3795128 It's a hard crossing,
but Shai-Hulud is strong.

4374208 4379963 Under our glorious black sun,
we welcome to these special festivities

4381340 4385219 our beloved leader
Baron Vladimir Harkonnen.

4395771 4401360 His presence today, watching over
a spectacle of blood and honor,

4402027 4408825 marks the Holy Birthday
of our beloved na-Baron, Feyd-Rautha.

4519311 4522856 In celebration of our
na-Baron Feyd-Rautha,

4532574 4536620 The last three specimens
of House Atreides.

5169461 5171630 The new Planetary
Governor of Arrakis!
5618744 5621413 What do you think of the outsider?
5956999 5960127 or they fight each other to death.
5969136 5971513 My daughter asks, how is it done?
6304429 6306390 I lost them all in the fire!
6312354 6314773 The whole of the North has been hit.

6319820 6322781 There is a call for a war council
in the South.

6410994 6413121 None of these people
will leave without you.
6716967 6719595 You're not allowed in here, stranger.
6729938 6733984 If you drink, you shall die.
6734735 6738822 If you drink, you may see.
6840132 6841967 They just arrived from the North.

6914581 6919253 The Lisan al-Gaib should find His way
to where no man has ever been.

6952452 6958876 He shall come back from the dead
with Desert Spring tears.
6961545 6964023 Bring me a drop of Water of Life.

7380839 7383800 Do you smash a knife
before battle?

7393977 7400692 There is no one in this room
who can stand against me!

7412746 7416542 Your mothers warned you
about my coming!
7437813 7440274 What if I could be the One?

7441233 7445487 This could be the moment you've been
praying for, all your life.

7448156 7452202 You're praying now,
to your grandmother.

7460794 7464590 A rock smashed her face
as she was crossing the Belt.

7468510 7473265 At that time, this world
had a Fremen name.

7488322 7492826 In your nightmares,
you give water to the dead,
7493118 7494912 and it brings joy to your heart!
7504129 7506673 Mahdi, what do you foresee for us?
7512012 7516558 Lisan al-Gaib, show us the Way!
7540707 7542918 The Hand of God be my witness!
7543418 7545879 I am the Voice from the Outer World!
7546171 7548549 I will lead you to paradise!
8502711 8505047 Bring the prisoners to the Residency.
8510636 8513138 Give the Baron's body to the desert.

subtitles.author: Blu-Duaine
lines: 60592 64426 The battle for Arrakis took everyone by surprise.
77674 80409 By morning, the Atreides were no more.
100600 103300 Since that night, my father has not been the same.
107000 110507 His inaction is difficult for me to accept.
110643 113739 For, I know he loved Duke Leto Atreides like a son.
119848 121820 [Irulan] But my father's always been guided
125753 129326 This would not be the first time the Harkonnens have done his dirty work.

137668 140403 In the shadows of Arrakis
lie many secrets…
142673 145276 but the darkest of them all may remain.
169128 171302 Shouldn't you go back to the stars,
175339 178903 I'm afraid I won't have enough time to fix things before your coming.

540972 544103 Never stand with your back
towards the open.

544238 546078 How many times do I have
to tell you that, huh?

560156 564255 <font color="#999999">[grunts]</font> They do not usually
venture this deep.

564390 566126 They wanna make sure
no Atreides escaped.

566261 568796 <font color="#999999">[Stilgar chuckles]</font>
You think too much of yourself.

568931 571566 No, no,
we are in the deep desert.

574366 576800 They were here for us,
not for you.

579911 582876 I'm taking you somewhere
they will never find us.

602267 606737 It's full of chemicals,
but good enough
for cooling systems.

623856 625166 - <font color="#999999">[Jessica]</font> I'm okay.
- <font color="#999999">[Paul]</font> Are you sure?
667732 669932 <font color="#999999">[Paul]</font> No, no, no. I'll do it.

736398 738400 Now that the spice fields
have been secured,

738536 741871 I strongly recommend bringing
all troops out
of Fremen territories.

742006 743768 We're losing too many men
to the desert.

746980 750078 - I beg your pardon?
- We're losing men to rats.

752983 755017 Fremen!
I can't confirm, my Lord.

755153 756888 Communications are hectic
in the open sands.

757023 760088 Your orders were to control
the whole planet.

761893 764488 - We are.
- I see only half of it.

764623 766138 <font color="#999999">[Harkonnen commander]</font>
As you may recall,

766162 769097 the South is uninhabitable,
my Lord.
771233 773000 May I suggest you get some rest?

776073 778473 Kill them! Kill them!
Kill them all!
829157 830357 He's asking why we're so late.

840037 842236 - <font color="#999999">[Chani]</font> He said…
- I got that.

842372 845805 - Thanks.
- <font color="#999999">[Stilgar]</font> Stay close to me.
Hmm?

896860 900129 - <font color="#999999">[angry, indistinct shouting
in Chakobsa]</font>
- <font color="#999999">[Stilgar speaks Chakobsa]</font>

1022389 1025188 Look how your Bene Gesserit
propaganda has taken root.

1027821 1030160 Some of them already think
I'm their messiah.

1040000 1042899 If they follow me,
we can disrupt
spice production.

1043034 1045274 That's the only way
I can get to the Emperor.

1046674 1048475 Your father didn't believe
in revenge.

1095392 1096990 <font color="#999999">[Paul]</font> There is spice
in the food.

1185884 1191688 None of us,
even dying of thirst,
would ever drink this water.
1202233 1205632 We have a thousand such places.
1209840 1214137 the Lisan al-Gaib will change the face of Arrakis.

1214272 1217314 He will bring back the trees.
He will bring back…

1235294 1239435 Never give your water away,
not even for the dead. Hmm?
1242140 1243435 Why are you showing me this?
1249079 1252778 The mother of the Lisan al-Gaib will be a Reverend Mother.

1258017 1260317 <font color="#999999">[whispers]</font>
You want me to take her place?

1280840 1282780 and you have no purpose
to serve.

1282915 1286982 What else is left to do then
but to return your water
to the well?
1292191 1293555 <font color="#999999">[Paul]</font> It's an honor, isn't it?
1295020 1296558 I think you should feel honored.

1296694 1298593 Well, it was a choice
between this or death,

1298728 1300760 so, you know, forgive me
if I'm not flattered.

1302732 1304335 How does one become
a Reverend Mother?

1304470 1306334 It's different from one culture
to another.
1306470 1308570 Here on Arrakis, I have no idea.

1314912 1316822 Reverend Mothers are tasked
with holding the memories

1316846 1318692 of all the Reverend Mothers
that came before them,

1318716 1322078 so I'll be given centuries
of pain and sorrow.

1396989 1399028 What are you guys
laughing about?
1405370 1406570 You don't believe in all this?

1408068 1410039 <font color="#999999">[Shishakli]</font>
These are old Southern beliefs.

1412077 1415479 Southern tribes believe
a messiah will come
to deliver us from evil.
1415614 1417576 You don't believe in the Lisan al-Gaib?

1422219 1425214 You want to control people,
you tell them
a messiah will come.

1425350 1429192 - Mm-hmm.
- Then they'll wait
for centuries.

1445844 1448640 He's from the South.
You didn't notice his accent?

1481308 1484043 <font color="#999999">[whispers]</font> I must not fear.
Fear is the mind-killer.

1484178 1487250 Fear, the little death
that brings total obliteration.
1487386 1489146 I will face my fear. I will…

1489282 1492655 <font color="#999999">[Fremen nuns continue
speaking in Chakobsa]</font>

1655820 1658386 My mother was trained
to do that.

1658522 1661824 Poison transmutation
is something advanced
Bene Gesserit can do.

1677304 1680744 Let me fight beside you.
That's all I'm asking.

1710502 1712402 <font color="#999999">[Jessica]</font> She was frightened,
but she's…
1746006 1750374 Only one step remains and you will become the Kwisatz Haderach.
1754013 1755344 You must do what I did.

1755480 1758683 You must drink
the Water of Life.

1758819 1762892 And your mind,
it's gon… it's gonna open
and you will see.

1773538 1778474 <font color="#999999">[Stilgar]</font> If you wanna fight
with us, first thing,
you must learn
1778610 1780536 to be one with the desert.

1781978 1785245 So, here is a tent
and enough food.

1785381 1790315 I want you to cross
that small erg and come back.

1792483 1794049 You know how to use
a paracompass?

1799932 1802192 Uh, beside the worms
and the Harkonnens,

1806104 1809570 Centipedes are very nasty.
Not the big ones.

1811408 1815241 But the little ones,
you have to worry about.
And… Oh!

1817542 1821379 Don't ever,
ever listen to the jinn.

1837936 1842169 Really, be careful.
They are demons.

1845141 1847207 But it's true.
Don't listen to them.

1936365 1939002 <font color="#999999">[Chani]</font> You sandwalk
like a drunk lizard.

1942040 1943436 Yeah, I'm doing
pretty good so far.

1943571 1946339 Yeah, well, you're not even
in worm territory yet.

1965163 1967063 <font color="#999999">[Chani]</font> You have to break up
your rhythm.

1973034 1975803 <font color="#999999">[Paul]</font> Now, that's interesting
because in the filmbooks
I've studied,

1975939 1979603 the anthropologists say,
in order to properly sandwalk,
you actually have…

2013472 2016905 You know, I'm the only one
who believes you're gonna
make it until summer?

2017040 2019214 Everyone else thinks
you won't make it two weeks.

2020382 2021689 If you wanna follow us
in the desert,

2021713 2023212 you need to know
how windtraps work.

2025017 2027354 They're simple,
but they require
constant attention.

2027489 2030654 Uh, this right here,
it captures the moisture

2030789 2032623 and then it carries it
into that pocket.
2033525 2036494 Uh, and these are the filters.

2036630 2038497 They need to be changed
every three days.
2045911 2047605 Stop looking at me like that.

2052745 2054379 <font color="#999999">[Jessica]</font>
He's training with the Fremen.

2054515 2056680 He will be back soon.
Don't worry.

2059884 2063424 You're right. If we want
to protect your brother,

2063559 2066763 we need all the Fremen
to believe in the prophecy.
2071029 2075699 We must convert the non-believers one by one.
2077639 2080374 We need to start with the weaker ones.

2110069 2112868 <font color="#999999">[Fedaykin fighter whispers]</font>
Hey, get out of here. Go.

2197154 2200230 <font color="#999999">[Harkonnen soldiers
and Fedaykin fighters grunt]</font>

2251275 2253195 <font color="#999999">[Fedaykin fighter and Chani
shouting in Chakobsa]</font>

2335731 2337800 <font color="#999999">[Paul]</font> Its shield will
only open when it fires.

2337935 2339612 <font color="#999999">[Chani]</font> I know that.
What do you think
I'm trying to do?

2339636 2342834 <font color="#999999">[Paul]</font> I'll trigger it.
On my signal. Be ready.

2440768 2442500 Who taught you
to fight like that?

2448811 2452141 They were massacred.
Alongside my father.

2457315 2460589 You've been fighting
the Harkonnens for decades.

2460725 2462992 My family's been fighting them
for centuries.

2463128 2467991 I know everything about them.
Their habits,
their ways of thinking.

2468127 2469567 You know everything
about the desert.

2469633 2472794 You harness
the very power of it.

2472929 2477969 We can stop them together,
bury them in the sand
where they belong.

2478104 2480268 So that this planet
can be yours once more.

2480404 2484279 <font color="#999999">[deeply inhales]</font> What would you
have us do? Huh?

2486182 2490318 I? I would… <font color="#999999">[sighs]</font>
would strike
even further north.
2490454 2492052 Then I will go further north.

2492188 2495123 And the further north you go,
the more likely it is you die.

2518913 2522117 <font color="#999999">[Stilgar]</font>
I see strength in you.
2539000 2544603 You shall be know among us as Usul.
2546339 2550476 [Stilgar] Usul. And now, a Fedaykin is a fighter
2558950 2560623 How do you call the, uh…
2569230 2573201 Muad'Dib is wise in the ways of the desert.
2577837 2581805 The constellation that points to the North Star, we call Muad'Dib.
2591786 2595752 Now you are our brother. Mmm.

2693187 2696220 Arrakis is so beautiful
when the sun is low.

2703497 2708302 Where you're from, does water
really fall from the sky?

2710369 2713642 Sometimes it rains
for weeks on Caladan.

2713778 2716240 Where you see sand here,
imagine water.

2719214 2723214 Our castle stands on cliffs
high above the sea.

2723349 2726185 If you dive in,
you can't reach the bottom.

2726321 2730189 - <font color="#999999">[Chani]</font> You dive in?
- Yes, it's called swimming.
2730324 2733228 [laughs] I don't… I don't believe you, Usul.

2751748 2753409 - I love it.
- I hate it.

2768030 2769863 Do you think Stilgar
would teach me?

2771529 2774869 <font color="#999999">[Chani laughs]</font>
No. Only Fremen ride worms.

2775005 2776669 Well, I thought I'd become one,
didn't I?

2781011 2785914 Your blood comes
from Dukes and Great Houses.

2790086 2793988 Here, we're equal,
men and women alike.

2794123 2796188 What we do,
we do for the benefit of all.

2796323 2798894 Well, I'd very much like
to be equal to you.
2815646 2817044 Maybe I'll show you the way.

2917874 2922143 <font color="#999999">[Baron Harkonnen]</font>
Fremen attacks on your watch.

2922278 2928352 Your orders were to restore
spice production
to full capacity.

2928488 2931125 Do you know
what it means if you fail?

2932526 2936625 The Emperor will take spice
out of our control.

2941172 2943665 <font color="#999999">[Baron Harkonnen]</font>
Or feel mine on your neck.

2974405 2977569 It's been a while
since you've had
one of those nightmares.

2982342 2984673 <font color="#999999">[Chani]</font> Tell me,
what was it about?
2995689 3000029 I'm in the South, and I'm following someone.
3006602 3010501 Millions and millions of people starving to death…

3018713 3021948 <font color="#999999">[Chani]</font> You've been exposed
to spice for a long time.

3034229 3035761 We can ask Stilgar
to call it off.

3066191 3070330 Don't try to impress anyone.
You are brave.
We all know that.

3078902 3081471 Nothing fancy or you will shame
my teaching.

3081607 3085339 I won't shame you.
I understand.

3530859 3533595 <font color="#999999">[Jessica]</font> Mm-hmm. Mm-hmm.
I know they do.
3536128 3538694 Our task in the North is nearly done.
3547370 3550106 They will protect him when he comes.

3595491 3597021 The way they look at you.

3602359 3604928 The Fedaykin,

3620782 3622217 fanning the flames

3710169 3711772 It's a story that you

3836459 3838826 eighty percent of our last crop.

4218309 4222844 This must not come out.

4272200 4273796 And I intend to find out.

5149739 5152641 we shall know

5220908 5223178 ♪ Do away with these idiots ♪

5464825 5469591 the smuggling business

5517912 5521042 Do you realize what you're able

5527114 5529254 Well, what are you waiting for?

5547541 5549373 Why is that a bad thing?

5560821 5564449 If I go South, all my visions

5718045 5719944 No matter what I do,

5742769 5744771 I'm doing this for all of us.

5868956 5873064 The 92 original

5899822 5902489 which stretch a thousand miles across the equator.

6345703 6348407 only leaders

6358681 6360446 I'd rather cut off my own hand.
6360581 6363114 We need you. We need the Lisan al-Gaib to lead our people.

Gurney Halleck! Go South!

6499254 6501692 [Jessica] You must drink the Water of Life.

6533857 6535522 If I go South, I might lose you.

6541800 6544295 Not as long

6551710 6553605 I'll cross the storms with you.

6603928 6605563 Send this message to the Baron.

6605699 6607892 The North is liberated

6626480 6630152 You killed nine of my men

6635290 6637927 I already know

6808101 6811100 you are not prepared for what is to come.

7098686 7102688 I see possible futures.

7103656 7107097 Our enemies are all around us.

7107233 7109761 And in so many futures,

7110496 7112566 But I do see a way.
7113567 7116174 There is a narrow way through.
7143163 7146369 You are the daughter of Baron Vladimir Harkonnen.

7156516 7159877 I didn't know myself,

7173264 7175530 So this is how we'll survive.

7278636 7281436 Stilgar, you can stop this.

7281572 7283169 You have the power to stop this.

7284841 7286681 You are not allowed

7286710 7288350 If you want to speak,

7304331 7307163 This prophecy

7311271 7312600 This is none of your business.

7312736 7314636 Rabban Harkonnen himself

7314771 7316634 He gave me this scar

7316769 7318908 This is all of my business.
7367955 7369954 If you wish to share your voice,

7370089 7372923 you must take his place

7373059 7375361 and returning his water

7375497 7379470 You think I'm stupid enough

7428983 7431423 But you think

7521944 7524208 This is my father's

7607426 7610096 <font color="#999999">[Irulan]</font>
Paul Atreides

7619909 7621407 Was this all upon your advice?

7623412 7626344 Did you counsel my father

7626479 7629918 Of course I did. Why else

7630053 7632389 You tried to sacrifice
an entire bloodline.
7632525 7634285 And I was right to do it.
7634420 7637659 The Kwisatz Haderach is a form of power
7637795 7639922 that our world has not yet seen.

7646470 7649606 They were promising,
but they were becoming
dangerously defiant.

7649742 7653073 Their bloodline
had to be terminated.

7653209 7655575 That is why we have put

7659984 7661624 And if
he defeats Feyd-Rautha,

7661748 7666055 Your father

7666191 7669093 But there is one way

in power

7669228 7672862 and, through you,

7678566 7681673 You've been preparing me

7683776 7686176 You're heading north

7687873 7690679 I follow my leaders.

7690814 7692094 Paul didn't have
a choice, Chani.
7692210 7694748 I won't be fighting for him.
7700056 7702089 I came to wish you best of luck.

7706700 7708458 but it seems
you've won your battle.

7739425 7741766 <font color="#999999">[Paul]</font> Oh, the Emperor's
very obliging.

7779466 7781971 I brought spice production
under control.

7787473 7790277 Send messages
to the Great Houses.

7790412 7794346 Tell them that Arrakis
is under Sardaukar attack.

7794481 7797547 Tell them, their future

7827250 7829413 Gurney will open

7829548 7831920 so you can enter
the basin from the West

7834421 7836121 Chani, I want you
and your Fedaykin
7836257 7837961 to then attack from the East,

7845036 7847772 And I'll serve Arrakeen
for dessert.

7847907 7850270 Remember,
I need the Emperor alive.
7921809 7926545 do you have any idea who this Muad'Dib could be?

7926680 7929751 Some fanatic, your Majesty.
That's all we know.

7945533 7948639 Or he went hiding
in the Southern storms

7954145 7956440 threatens the integrity
of our shields.

7956576 7958479 We recommend
going back into orbit.

7972362 7974963 Well, the entire region
is uninhabitable.

7985075 7987275 <font color="#999999">[Baron]</font>
I wasn't aware of this.

7987410 7989842 I swear to you,
I wasn't aware
of any of this.
8602659 8604628 Look who's back from the dead.
8618773 8622305 For my Duke, and my friends.

8693786 8696147 Gurney, it's time.
Bring the prisoners.

8735090 8737288 I will love you
as long as I breathe.

8749301 8751973 There is a massed armada
in orbit.

8755176 8758644 You're facing
a full invasion, Fremen.

8758779 8762280 <font color="#999999">[Paul]</font> How can you
be so sure the Great Houses
are here for me?

8767855 8772261 They may be curious
to hear my side of the story,
don't you think?

8772397 8777163 I am Paul Atreides,
son of Leto Atreides,
Duke of Arrakis.
8780297 8782472 Send a warning to all ships.

8782608 8786843 If the Great Houses attack,
our atomics will obliterate
all spice fields.

8788144 8790540 - You're out of your mind.
- He's bluffing.

8790675 8792641 Consider what you're
about to do, Paul Atreides.

8792777 8795284 - <font color="#999999">[distorted]</font> Silence!
- <font color="#999999">[Reverend Mother Mohiam gasps]</font>

8806495 8810163 As a servant of the Imperium,
you will bow at my feet.

8810299 8814101 Your feet? You'll be lucky
to keep your head.

8817139 8818974 I'll take the hand
of your daughter.

8823311 8825849 And we will rule together
over the Empire.

8839832 8841590 You have to answer
for my father.
8849037 8852975 Do you know why I killed him?

8856047 8858211 who believed
in the rules of the heart.

8859379 8861478 But the heart
is not meant to rule.
8866317 8870190 your father was a weak man.

8903654 8906760 Do not stain your hands
on this animal.
8928720 8930916 Why does he take such risks?

8957214 8960709 I'm happy
to finally meet you, cousin.

8966852 8972160 Well, you wouldn't be
the first relative I've killed.
8974558 8977594 May thy knife chip and shatter.

8980634 8985173 <font color="#999999">[chuckles softly]</font>
May thy knife chip and shatter.

9053606 9057179 Any special attention
for the pet?
9244035 9245668 The life debt has been paid.

9245803 9247608 Spare my father now
and I will be
your willing bride.

9341729 9344993 My Lord,
the Great Houses have answered.

9345129 9347436 They refuse
to honor your ascendancy.

9397819 9400522 Your brother attacks
the Great Houses.

subtitles.author: LeZee
lines: 59956 63790 The battle for Arrakis took everyone by surprise.
77038 79773 By morning, the Atreides were no more.
99964 102664 Since that night, my father has not been the same.
106364 109871 His inaction is difficult for me to accept.
110007 113103 For, I know he loved Duke Leto Atreides like a son.
119212 121184 IRULAN: But my father's always been guided
125117 128690 This would not be the first time the Harkonnens have done his dirty work.

137032 139767 In the shadows of Arrakis
lie many secrets...
142037 144640 but the darkest of them all may remain.
168492 170666 Shouldn't you go back to the stars,
174703 178267 I'm afraid I won't have enough time to fix things before your coming.

540336 543467 Never stand with your back
towards the open.

543602 545442 How many times do I have
to tell you that, huh?
559520 563619 [GRUNTS] They do not usually venture this deep.

563754 565490 They wanna make sure
no Atreides escaped.
565625 568160 [STILGAR CHUCKLES] You think too much of yourself.

568295 570930 No, no,
we are in the deep desert.

573730 576164 They were here for us,
not for you.

579275 582240 I'm taking you somewhere
they will never find us.

601631 606101 It's full of chemicals,
but good enough for cooling systems.
623220 624530 - JESSICA: I'm okay. - PAUL: Are you sure?
667096 669296 PAUL: No, no, no. I'll do it.

735762 737764 Now that the spice fields
have been secured,

737900 741235 I strongly recommend bringing

to the desert.

746344 749442 - I beg your pardon?
- We're losing men to rats.

- I see only half of it.

765526 768461 the South is uninhabitable,

770597 772364 May I suggest you get some rest?

775437 777837 Kill them! Kill them!
Kill them all!
828521 829721 He's asking why we're so late.
