7645834 7648970 They were promising, but they
were becoming dangerously defiant.

7649106 7652437 Their bloodline
had to be terminated.

7652573 7654939 That is why we have put
many bloodlines at work.

7659348 7660988 And if he defeats
Feyd-Rautha, my father--

7661112 7665419 Your father will lose the
throne no matter who prevails.

7665555 7668457 But there is one way your
family can remain in power

7668592 7672226 and, through you,
the continuation of our stewardship.

7677930 7681037 You've been preparing me
my whole life, Reverend Mother.

7683140 7685540 You're heading north
with the others?

7687237 7690043 I follow my leaders.
If fighting goes north, I go north.

7690178 7691458 Paul didn't have
a choice, Chani.
7691574 7694112 I won't be fighting for him.
7699420 7701453 I came to wish you best of luck.
7706064 7707822 but it seems you've won your battle.
7738789 7741130 PAUL: Oh, the Emperor's very obliging.

7778830 7781335 I brought spice production
under control.
7786837 7789641 Send messages to the Great Houses.

7789776 7793710 Tell them that Arrakis
is under Sardaukar attack.

7793845 7796911 Tell them, their future
hangs in the balance.
7823875 7826479 PAUL: When the storm hits this ridge,

7826614 7828777 Gurney will open
the way for you, Stilgar,

7828912 7831284 so you can enter
the basin from the West

7833785 7835485 Chani, I want you
and your Fedaykin
7835621 7837325 to then attack from the East,

7839957 7842162 I'll strike from the North,
head on,

7844400 7847136 And I'll serve Arrakeen
for dessert.

7847271 7849634 Remember,
I need the Emperor alive.
7921173 7925909 do you have any idea who this Muad'Dib could be?

7926044 7929115 Some fanatic, your Majesty.
That's all we know.

7944897 7948003 Or he went hiding
in the Southern storms

7953509 7955804 threatens the integrity
of our shields.

7955940 7957843 We recommend
going back into orbit.

7957979 7960349 Well, the mountains will
protect us from most of it,

7971726 7974327 Well, the entire region
is uninhabitable.
7984439 7986639 BARON: I wasn't aware of this.

7986774 7989206 I swear to you,
I wasn't aware of any of this.
8602023 8603992 Look who's back from the dead.
8618137 8621669 For my Duke, and my friends.

8693150 8695511 Gurney, it's time.
Bring the prisoners.

8734454 8736652 I will love you
as long as I breathe.

8748665 8751337 There is a massed armada
in orbit.

8754540 8758008 You're facing
a full invasion, Fremen.
8758143 8761644 PAUL: How can you be so sure the Great Houses are here for me?

8767219 8771625 They may be curious to hear my
side of the story, don't you think?

8771761 8776527 I am Paul Atreides, son of
Leto Atreides, Duke of Arrakis.
8779661 8781836 Send a warning to all ships.

8781972 8786207 If the Great Houses attack,
our atomics will obliterate all spice fields.

8787508 8789904 - You're out of your mind.
- He's bluffing.

8790039 8792005 Consider what you're
about to do, Paul Atreides.
8792141 8794648 - [DISTORTED] Silence! - [REVEREND MOTHER MOHIAM GASPS]

8805859 8809527 As a servant of the Imperium,
you will bow at my feet.

8809663 8813465 Your feet? You'll be lucky
to keep your head.

8816503 8818338 I'll take the hand
of your daughter.

8822675 8825213 And we will rule together
over the Empire.

8839196 8840954 You have to answer
for my father.
8848401 8852339 Do you know why I killed him?
8855411 8857575 who believed in the rules of the heart.
8858743 8860842 But the heart is not meant to rule.
8865681 8869554 your father was a weak man.

8903018 8906124 Do not stain your hands
on this animal.
8928084 8930280 Why does he take such risks?
8956578 8960073 I'm happy to finally meet you, cousin.

8966216 8971524 Well, you wouldn't be
the first relative I've killed.
8973922 8976958 May thy knife chip and shatter.
8979998 8984537 [CHUCKLES SOFTLY] May thy knife chip and shatter.

9052970 9056543 Any special attention
for the pet?
9243399 9245032 The life debt has been paid.

9245167 9246972 Spare my father now and
I will be your willing bride.

9341093 9344357 My Lord,
the Great Houses have answered.

9344493 9346800 They refuse
to honor your ascendancy.

9397183 9399886 Your brother attacks
the Great Houses.

subtitles.author: LeZee
lines: 59956 63790 The battle for Arrakis took everyone by surprise.
77038 79773 By morning, the Atreides were no more.
99964 102664 Since that night, my father has not been the same.
106364 109871 His inaction is difficult for me to accept.
110007 113103 For, I know he loved Duke Leto Atreides like a son.
125117 128690 This would not be the first time the Harkonnens have done his dirty work.

137032 139767 In the shadows of Arrakis
lie many secrets...
142037 144640 but the darkest of them all may remain.
168492 170666 Shouldn't you go back to the stars,
174703 178267 I'm afraid I won't have enough time to fix things before your coming.

540336 543467 Never stand with your back
towards the open.

543602 545442 How many times do I have
to tell you that, huh?
559520 563619 [GRUNTS] They do not usually venture this deep.

563754 565490 They wanna make sure
no Atreides escaped.
565625 568160 [STILGAR CHUCKLES] You think too much of yourself.

568295 570930 No, no,
we are in the deep desert.

573730 576164 They were here for us,
not for you.

579275 582240 I'm taking you somewhere
they will never find us.

601631 606101 It's full of chemicals,
but good enough for cooling systems.
667096 669296 PAUL: No, no, no. I'll do it.

735762 737764 Now that the spice fields
have been secured,

737900 741235 I strongly recommend bringing
all troops out of Fremen territories.

741370 743132 We're losing too many men
to the desert.

746344 749442 - I beg your pardon?
- We're losing men to rats.

752347 754381 Fremen!
I can't confirm, my Lord.

754517 756252 Communications are hectic
in the open sands.

756387 759452 Your orders were to control
the whole planet.

761257 763852 - We are.
- I see only half of it.

765526 768461 the South is uninhabitable,
my Lord.
770597 772364 May I suggest you get some rest?

775437 777837 Kill them! Kill them!
Kill them all!
828521 829721 He's asking why we're so late.
841736 845169 - Thanks. - STILGAR: Stay close to me. Hmm?
896224 899493 - [ANGRY, INDISTINCT SHOUTING IN CHAKOBSA] - [STILGAR SPEAKS CHAKOBSA]

1021753 1024552 Look how your Bene Gesserit
propaganda has taken root.

1027185 1029524 Some of them already think
I'm their messiah.

1039364 1042263 If they follow me,
we can disrupt spice production.

1042398 1044638 That's the only way
I can get to the Emperor.

1046038 1047839 Your father didn't believe
in revenge.
1094756 1096354 PAUL: There is spice in the food.

1185248 1191052 None of us, even dying of thirst,
would ever drink this water.
1201597 1204996 We have a thousand such places.
1209204 1213501 the Lisan al-Gaib will change the face of Arrakis.

1213636 1216678 He will bring back the trees.
He will bring back...

1234658 1238799 Never give your water away,
not even for the dead. Hmm?
1241504 1242799 Why are you showing me this?
1248443 1252142 The mother of the Lisan al-Gaib will be a Reverend Mother.
1257381 1259681 [WHISPERS] You want me to take her place?

1280204 1282144 and you have no purpose
to serve.

1282279 1286346 What else is left to do then but
to return your water to the well?
1294384 1295922 I think you should feel honored.

1296058 1297957 Well, it was a choice
between this or death,

1298092 1300124 so, you know, forgive me
if I'm not flattered.

1302096 1303699 How does one become
a Reverend Mother?

1303834 1305698 It's different from one culture
to another.

1305834 1307934 Here on Arrakis,
I have no idea.

1314276 1316186 Reverend Mothers are tasked
with holding the memories

1316210 1318056 of all the Reverend Mothers
that came before them,

1318080 1321442 so I'll be given centuries
of pain and sorrow.

1396353 1398392 What are you guys
laughing about?
1404734 1405934 You don't believe in all this?

1411441 1414843 Southern tribes believe a messiah
will come to deliver us from evil.
1414978 1416940 You don't believe in the Lisan al-Gaib?

1421583 1424578 You want to control people,
you tell them a messiah will come.

1424714 1428556 - Mm-hmm.
- Then they'll wait for centuries.

1445208 1448004 He's from the South.
You didn't notice his accent?
1480672 1483407 [WHISPERS] I must not fear. Fear is the mind-killer.

1483542 1486614 Fear, the little death
that brings total obliteration.

1486750 1488510 I will face my fear.
I will...

1655184 1657750 My mother was trained
to do that.

1657886 1661188 Poison transmutation is something
advanced Bene Gesserit can do.

1676668 1680108 Let me fight beside you.
That's all I'm asking.
1745370 1749738 Only one step remains and you will become the Kwisatz Haderach.
1753377 1754708 You must do what I did.

1754844 1758047 You must drink
the Water of Life.

1758183 1762256 And your mind, it's gon--
it's gonna open and you will see.
1772902 1777838 STILGAR: If you wanna fight with us, first thing, you must learn
1777974 1779900 to be one with the desert.

1781342 1784609 So, here is a tent
and enough food.

1784745 1789679 I want you to cross
that small erg and come back.

1791847 1793413 You know how to use
a paracompass?

1799296 1801556 Uh, beside the worms
and the Harkonnens,

1805468 1808934 Centipedes are very nasty.
Not the big ones.

1810772 1814605 But the little ones, you have to worry about.
And... Oh!

1816906 1820743 Don't ever,
ever listen to the jinn.

1837300 1841533 Really, be careful.
They are demons.

1844505 1846571 But it's true.
Don't listen to them.
1935729 1938366 CHANI: You sandwalk like a drunk lizard.
1941404 1942800 Yeah, I'm doing pretty good so far.

1942935 1945703 Yeah, well, you're not even
in worm territory yet.
1964527 1966427 CHANI: You have to break up your rhythm.
1972398 1975167 PAUL: Now, that's interesting because in the filmbooks I've studied,

1975303 1978967 the anthropologists say, in order to
properly sandwalk, you actually have--

2012836 2016269 You know, I'm the only one who believes
you're gonna make it until summer?

2016404 2018578 Everyone else thinks
you won't make it two weeks.

2019746 2021053 If you wanna follow us
in the desert,

2021077 2022576 you need to know
how windtraps work.

2024381 2026718 They're simple, but they
require constant attention.

2026853 2030018 Uh, this right here,
it captures the moisture

2030153 2031987 and then it carries it
into that pocket.
2032889 2035858 Uh, and these are the filters.

2035994 2037861 They need to be changed
every three days.
2045275 2046969 Stop looking at me like that.

2053879 2056044 He will be back soon.
Don't worry.

2059248 2062788 You're right. If we want
to protect your brother,

2062923 2066127 we need all the Fremen
to believe in the prophecy.
2070393 2075063 We must convert the non-believers one by one.
2077003 2079738 We need to start with the weaker ones.
2109433 2112232 [FEDAYKIN FIGHTER WHISPERS] Hey, get out of here. Go.
2250639 2252559 [FEDAYKIN FIGHTER AND CHANI SHOUTING IN CHAKOBSA]
2335095 2337164 PAUL: Its shield will only open when it fires.
2337299 2338976 CHANI: I know that. What do you think I'm trying to do?
2339000 2342198 PAUL: I'll trigger it. On my signal. Be ready.

2440132 2441864 Who taught you
to fight like that?

2448175 2451505 They were massacred.
Alongside my father.

2456679 2459953 You've been fighting
the Harkonnens for decades.

2460089 2462356 My family's been fighting them
for centuries.

2462492 2467355 I know everything about them.
Their habits, their ways of thinking.

2467491 2468931 You know everything
about the desert.

2468997 2472158 You harness
the very power of it.

2472293 2477333 We can stop them together,
bury them in the sand where they belong.

2477468 2479632 So that this planet
can be yours once more.
2479768 2483643 [DEEPLY INHALES] What would you have us do? Huh?
2485546 2489682 I? I would... [SIGHS] would strike even further north.
2489818 2491416 Then I will go further north.

2491552 2494487 And the further north you go,
the more likely it is you die.
2538364 2543967 You shall be know among us as Usul.
2545703 2549840 STILGAR: Usul. And now, a Fedaykin is a fighter
2558314 2559987 How do you call the, uh...
2568594 2572565 Muad'Dib is wise in the ways of the desert.
2577201 2581169 The constellation that points to the North Star, we call Muad'Dib.

2591150 2595116 Now you are our brother.
Mmm.

2692551 2695584 Arrakis is so beautiful
when the sun is low.

2702861 2707666 Where you're from, does water
really fall from the sky?

2709733 2713006 Sometimes it rains
for weeks on Caladan.

2713142 2715604 Where you see sand here,
imagine water.

2718578 2722578 Our castle stands on cliffs
high above the sea.

2722713 2725549 If you dive in,
you can't reach the bottom.
2725685 2729553 - CHANI: You dive in? - Yes, it's called swimming.
2729688 2732592 [LAUGHS] I don't-- I don't believe you, Usul.

2751112 2752773 - I love it.
- I hate it.

2767394 2769227 Do you think Stilgar
would teach me?
2770893 2774233 [CHANI LAUGHS] No. Only Fremen ride worms.

2774369 2776033 Well, I thought I'd become one,
didn't I?

2780375 2785278 Your blood comes
from Dukes and Great Houses.

2789450 2793352 Here, we're equal,
men and women alike.

2793487 2795552 What we do,
we do for the benefit of all.

2795687 2798258 Well, I'd very much like
to be equal to you.
2815010 2816408 Maybe I'll show you the way.
2917238 2921507 BARON HARKONNEN: Fremen attacks on your watch.

2921642 2927716 Your orders were to restore
spice production to full capacity.

2927852 2930489 Do you know
what it means if you fail?

2931890 2935989 The Emperor will take spice
out of our control.
2940536 2943029 BARON HARKONNEN: Or feel mine on your neck.

2973769 2976933 It's been a while since you've
had one of those nightmares.
2981706 2984037 CHANI: Tell me, what was it about?
2995053 2999393 I'm in the South, and I'm following someone.
3005966 3009865 Millions and millions of people starving to death...
3018077 3021312 CHANI: You've been exposed to spice for a long time.

3033593 3035125 We can ask Stilgar
to call it off.

3065555 3069694 Don't try to impress anyone.
You are brave. We all know that.

3078266 3080835 Nothing fancy or you will shame
my teaching.

3080971 3084703 I won't shame you.
I understand.
3084839 3089879 Shai-Hulud decides today if you become Fremen, or if you die.
3530223 3532959 JESSICA: Mm-hmm. Mm-hmm. I know they do.
3535492 3538058 Our task in the North is nearly done.
3546734 3549470 They will protect him when he comes.
3551742 3556312 The Kwisatz Haderach will be born in the South.
3594855 3596385 The way they look at you.

3601723 3604292 The Fedaykin,
they count your victories.
3604428 3606930 They say you can see the future.
3614205 3617273 I'm a Fedaykin of Sietch Tabr.

3617409 3620011 Yet, we have a Bene Gesserit
among us,

3620146 3621581 fanning the flames
of your legend,

3650475 3652507 She says you should
be coming with us.

3656613 3658480 Because I must continue
fighting in the North,

3658615 3661021 to protect you down
there in the South.

3662585 3665920 She says she can tell
when you lie.

3666056 3669755 Tell her that's because our mother
keeps spreading dangerous tales.
3679007 3681306 She says you're blinded by love,

3681441 3683503 and she reminds you that
you must reserve your hand

3688308 3691583 She's also wondering why
you don't believe in who you are.

3692746 3695055 I believe I matter
to these people.

3696457 3698652 And I believe I'm making
a difference in this war.

3700492 3701972 We're nearly
at the gates of the city.

3702055 3704825 - That's not what she means.
- I know what she means.

3704961 3707600 Do you not think I also feel
the weight of the prophecy?

3709533 3711136 It's a story that you
keep telling,

3711272 3713205 but it's not their story,
it's yours.

3713340 3716440 They deserve to be led
by one of their own.

3716575 3719176 What your people did
to this world is heartbreaking.
3719312 3720878 We gave them something to hope for.
3835823 3838190 eighty percent of our last crop.

3838326 3842093 My Lord Rabban, you should
not leave the security perimeter.

3842228 3844731 Security perimeter?
The rats are already inside.
3844866 3846805 The Fremen Demon might be with them.
3848510 3850284 HARKONNEN SOLDIER: We're tracking them, my Lord.
3897888 3899728 RABBAN: Why do I have to do everything myself?
4125749 4128829 PRINCESS IRULAN: It's not the first time we've had frictions with the Fremen.

4137763 4140159 how would you deal
with this prophet?
4146168 4149234 If this Muad'Dib is a religious figure,

4154044 4157176 Repression only makes
a religion flourish.

4157311 4159483 You'll only end up
humiliating yourself.

4161183 4164249 You underestimate
the power of faith.

4167755 4171729 Her Highness proves once again
that she was my most acute student.

4176703 4178670 Prophets get stronger
when they die.

4180136 4182639 Let the conflict
on Arrakis turn into war.

4182775 4186139 You then bring peace.
As a savior.
4197721 4200090 The one who points the way.

4200225 4202490 These are our own
religious patterns, aren't they?

4210638 4212737 An unusual war name
for a Fremen.
4214538 4217538 - What if Paul Atreides were still alive? - [DISTORTED] Enough!

4217673 4222208 This must not come out.
Even to your father's ears. Understand?
4225715 4229048 REVEREND MOTHER MOHIAM: If Paul is alive, he likely knows the truth.

4229184 4231056 And should
the Great Houses learn

4231191 4234188 that your father was behind
the liquidation of the Atreides,

4234323 4238059 your father will face war
and lose the throne.

4245036 4249367 We are Bene Gesserit.
We don't hope, we plan.
4250544 4254005 Paul is not our only prospect.

4254140 4259751 The Baron's youngest nephew,
Feyd-Rautha Harkonnen, will inherit Arrakis.

4267189 4271428 The question is,
can we control him?
4271564 4273160 And I intend to find out.
4296289 4299021 FEYD-RAUTHA: Would you like some fresh meat, my darlings?
4302857 4306027 FEYD-RAUTHA: What would you like? I hear they're big today.

4306163 4310533 Your new blades
for this very special day,
4362987 4365124 LANVILLE: I won't die like a fool.
4366321 4369190 No drug for you today, Atreides.
4444337 4446377 LADY MARGOT FENRING: Welcome to Giedi Prime, sisters.

4446401 4448406 I hope your travels
were agreeable.
4448542 4450950 BENE GESSERIT SISTER #1: A long way to come just to watch our prospect
4455012 4456915 These fights are all for show.

4458182 4460480 But we'll get
a good look at him.
4637023 4639203 BENE GESSERIT SISTER #2: Why do they not stop the fight?
4788809 4791276 This morning you were a playboy,

4798456 4800351 I ought to drown you
in that tub.
4804261 4806796 I have another gift for you.
4816841 4819206 BARON HARKONNEN: He has failed to protect spice production.

4828420 4831223 Free the spice.
I'll make you Emperor.

4851478 4854609 The Emperor helped me
destroy the Atreides.

4855744 4858617 He lent his own army
to the cause.

4860920 4865521 If it came to light, the Great
Houses would rise against him.
4868622 4871263 who will sit on the throne?

4924312 4929420 Will you show me the way out
of this maze, my Lord na-Baron?

4946605 4948800 I'm here to honor
your coming of age.

4948935 4950903 You're not allowed
in this section.
4951839 4953338 How did you get past the guards?
4957649 4959747 [DISTORTED] May I ask, what are you doing here?

4961819 4965456 You're not taking part
in your own celebrations?
4978266 4981237 LADY MARGOT FENRING: And what makes you say that?
4983870 4986272 I dreamed about you last night.
4986407 4988116 LADY MARGOT FENRING: A pleasant dream, I hope.

4993552 4996454 I know your
Bene Gesserit tricks.

4996589 4999050 And what do you know
about the Bene Gesserit?
5047740 5053412 [LADY MARGOT FENRING WHISPERS] Come. To. Me.
5071558 5074829 [LADY MARGOT FENRING WHISPERS] Put your right hand in the box.
5089642 5093181 LADY MARGOT FENRING: A sociopath. Of high intelligence.
5102695 5104135 REVEREND MOTHER MOHIAM: Can he be redeemed?
5104159 5105802 LADY MARGOT FENRING: He can be controlled.

5121781 5125176 Respectfully, why didn't you
test him yourself?

5128922 5132422 And based on what happened
between him and his own mother,
5132558 5134988 I didn't expect to be effective.

5135123 5136924 What happened between
him and his mother?

5149103 5152005 we shall know
how to control him.
5172695 5175098 Rid me of this Fremen Demon.
5225379 5229621 ♪ My stillsuit Is full of piss ♪
5230788 5235121 ♪ My hand is caked in sand ♪
5236830 5238991 ♪ Save me from These utter morons ♪
5253373 5255278 MAN #1: Well, it was nice knowing ya.
5283009 5284814 [MAN #2 THROUGH COMMS] Yeah, I got a meter reading--
5284838 5286815 [THROUGH COMMS] MAN #1: All right, guys, worms are on their way.
5286839 5288116 - MAN #2: Watch out for abrasions. - MAN #1: Get ready to dock.
5441331 5443761 GURNEY: Mmm. After the Battle of Arrakeen,

5443896 5447806 I was able to negotiate a trip
back home for the survivors.
5460846 5464054 Well, since Muad'Dib's been driving Rabban crazy,

5464189 5468955 the smuggling business
has been quite profitable.

5517276 5520406 Do you realize what you're able
to achieve with 200 men?

5523280 5524824 Duncan said there
were millions of them.
5526478 5528618 Well, what are you waiting for?

5528754 5532056 With thousands of these guys,
you could take control of the entire planet.

5532191 5534118 It's your father's dream.
What are you afraid of?

5546905 5548737 Why is that a bad thing?
Use it.

5550875 5553743 You have the power to avenge
your father, and you're afraid to use it?

5560185 5563813 If I go South, all my visions
lead to horror.

5563948 5567557 Billions of corpses
scattered across the galaxy.
5598587 5600387 What? [CHUCKLES] Look at him, he's hopeless.

5634523 5637226 No need to be a prophet
to see what's ahead.

5648738 5652608 What will you do when you feel
its breath upon your neck?

5656040 5658408 If you don't want to raise
an army in the South,
5658544 5660381 you may still have an option.

5675565 5678300 I know where your father
hid the family atomics.
5683507 5686506 PAUL: Every House possesses an atomic arsenal.
5687881 5689806 I thought ours had been lost.

5691878 5694646 It's huge, Chani.
It could change everything.

5699721 5703292 I could aim the bombs
at the main spice fields.

5704860 5708462 He who can destroy a thing
has the real control of it.

5709795 5711630 So, you can control it
and not us?

5713700 5715700 You promised me
you didn't want power.

5717409 5719308 No matter what I do,
you still don't trust me.

5719444 5722410 'Cause you're a foreigner.
Like your friend.
5735257 5737128 But to the desert, you are.
5742133 5744135 I'm doing this for all of us.

5776997 5779599 Nobody would ever look in there
because it's obvious.

5790909 5793250 Enough to blow up
the whole planet.

5868320 5872428 The 92 original Atreides
family's atomic warheads.

5891750 5895311 Reports from the south
of Arrakis arrive rarely.
5895446 5899050 These are barren, burnt lands hidden by sandstorms
5899186 5901853 which stretch a thousand miles across the equator.
5907430 5911896 Which is why our Bene Gesserit missionaries have been so productive there.
5915040 5917902 Through them, we are receiving reports of a mysterious figure
5923549 5926884 A new Reverend Mother from the North...
5927019 5931222 spreading word of the imminent arrival of the Lisan al-Gaib,
5934253 5937422 With religious fervor rising in the South,
5937558 5941257 and Muad'Dib strangling spice production in the North,
5941392 5945303 everything points to the escalation of war.

6087041 6088643 Soon a man
is going to visit your temple

6088779 6091413 and he may want
you to perform the rites.

6204862 6207390 We're literally melting rock
on their heads.

6207525 6210462 I want to go on the ground.
Prepare my troops.
6210598 6213864 My Lord. I would recommend you stay inside. There was-- [CHOKES]
6214000 6216039 Bring his body to my quarters.

6219272 6221337 There was no food
for them on the flight.

6225212 6228350 It's early morning.
What are you doing here?
6264584 6267625 BARON HARKONNEN: Embarrass our family one more time...
6304622 6307362 STILGAR: They didn't even engage on the ground,

6345067 6347771 only leaders
are allowed to speak.

6348874 6351433 - You must take my place.
- I can't do that.

6351569 6354371 It is a good time
to cross blades with me.
6354506 6357910 I am weak. I am an easy kill, Muad'Dib.
6358045 6359810 I'd rather cut off my own hand.
6359945 6362478 We need you. We need the Lisan al-Gaib to lead our people.

6362614 6364447 You know what I think
of all that, Stilgar.

6364582 6367384 I don't care what you believe.
I believe.
6387778 6389807 They just went back to reload.

6391850 6393190 We're moving everyone
to the South.

6393214 6395018 I'll stay behind
and cover your retreat.

6395154 6397788 - What are you talking about?
- Chani, I can't go with you.
6399783 6401703 - GURNEY: I'll stay, too. - Nobody stays but me.
6401788 6404459 - GURNEY: Paul. - That's an order, Gurney Halleck! Go South!
6462386 6466516 You cannot see the future without seeing the past.
6468286 6473025 To unlock your mind, you need to drink the Water of Life...
6479705 6483401 JAMIS: A good hunter always climbs the highest dune before his hunt.
6498618 6501056 JESSICA: You must drink the Water of Life.

6526181 6528314 The world has made
choices for us.
6533221 6534886 If I go South, I might lose you.

6541164 6543659 Not as long
as you stay who you are.
6551074 6552969 I'll cross the storms with you.

6563384 6566286 And then I will do
what must be done.
6595817 6598648 FEYD-RAUTHA: They've gone South to hide in the storms.
6603292 6604927 Send this message to the Baron.

6605063 6607256 The North is liberated
and secured.

6625844 6629516 You killed nine of my men
with one single blade.

6634654 6637291 I already know
everything I need to know.
6772297 6776397 [ANCIENT VOICE] Now that you can see our past,
6807465 6810464 you are not prepared for what is to come.
6811899 6815304 You'll now learn the truth about our family.
6815439 6819209 And it will hurt you to the core.

6899887 6902725 His vital signs are so low,
they can't be detected.
6904160 6905856 What did you do to him?

6906925 6909129 No, not that.
Why would he do that?

6919205 6922910 Chani, his body is fighting the
poison and he needs your help.
6926547 6928113 You did this to your own son!

6931219 6934649 Chani, you might not believe in
the prophecy, but you're a part of it.

6936527 6939125 You and your lies.
Why would you do this?

7098050 7102052 I see possible futures.
All at once.
7103020 7106461 Our enemies are all around us.

7106597 7109125 And in so many futures,
they prevail.
7109860 7111930 But I do see a way.
7112931 7115538 There is a narrow way through.
7142527 7145733 You are the daughter of Baron Vladimir Harkonnen.

7155880 7159241 I didn't know myself,
until I took the worm's poison.
7172628 7174894 So this is how we'll survive.

7278000 7280800 Stilgar, you can stop this.
Do you hear me?
7280936 7282533 You have the power to stop this.

7284205 7286045 You are not allowed
to speak inside the circle.

7286074 7287714 If you want to speak,
you know what to do.
7303695 7306527 This prophecy is how they enslave us!
7310635 7311964 This is none of your business.

7312100 7314000 Rabban Harkonnen himself
killed my family.

7314135 7315998 He gave me this scar
to remember him by.
7316133 7318272 This is all of my business.
7367319 7369318 If you wish to share your voice,

7369453 7372287 you must take his place
by defeating him

7372423 7374725 and returning his water
to the well.

7374861 7378834 You think I'm stupid enough to
deprive myself of the best of us?

7428347 7430787 But you think
you could have a chance.
7521308 7523572 This is my father's ducal signet.
7619273 7620771 Was this all upon your advice?

7622776 7625708 Did you counsel my father
to exterminate the Atreides?

7625843 7629282 Of course I did.
Why else would it have happened?

7629417 7631753 You tried to sacrifice
an entire bloodline.
7631889 7633649 And I was right to do it.
7633784 7637023 The Kwisatz Haderach is a form of power
7637159 7639286 that our world has not yet seen.

7645834 7648970 They were promising, but they
were becoming dangerously defiant.

7649106 7652437 Their bloodline
had to be terminated.

7652573 7654939 That is why we have put
many bloodlines at work.

7659348 7660988 And if he defeats
Feyd-Rautha, my father--

7661112 7665419 Your father will lose the
throne no matter who prevails.

7665555 7668457 But there is one way your
family can remain in power

7668592 7672226 and, through you,
the continuation of our stewardship.

7677930 7681037 You've been preparing me
my whole life, Reverend Mother.

7683140 7685540 You're heading north
with the others?

7687237 7690043 I follow my leaders.
If fighting goes north, I go north.

7690178 7691458 Paul didn't have
a choice, Chani.
7691574 7694112 I won't be fighting for him.
7699420 7701453 I came to wish you best of luck.
7706064 7707822 but it seems you've won your battle.

7778830 7781335 I brought spice production
under control.
7786837 7789641 Send messages to the Great Houses.

7789776 7793710 Tell them that Arrakis
is under Sardaukar attack.

7793845 7796911 Tell them, their future
hangs in the balance.
7823875 7826479 PAUL: When the storm hits this ridge,

7826614 7828777 Gurney will open
the way for you, Stilgar,

7828912 7831284 so you can enter
the basin from the West

7833785 7835485 Chani, I want you
and your Fedaykin
7835621 7837325 to then attack from the East,

7839957 7842162 I'll strike from the North,
head on,

7844400 7847136 And I'll serve Arrakeen
for dessert.

7847271 7849634 Remember,
I need the Emperor alive.
7921173 7925909 do you have any idea who this Muad'Dib could be?

7926044 7929115 Some fanatic, your Majesty.
That's all we know.

7944897 7948003 Or he went hiding
in the Southern storms

7953509 7955804 threatens the integrity
of our shields.

7955940 7957843 We recommend
going back into orbit.

7957979 7960349 Well, the mountains will
protect us from most of it,

7971726 7974327 Well, the entire region
is uninhabitable.

7986774 7989206 I swear to you,
I wasn't aware of any of this.
8602023 8603992 Look who's back from the dead.
8618137 8621669 For my Duke, and my friends.

8693150 8695511 Gurney, it's time.
Bring the prisoners.

8734454 8736652 I will love you
as long as I breathe.

8748665 8751337 There is a massed armada
in orbit.

8754540 8758008 You're facing
a full invasion, Fremen.
8758143 8761644 PAUL: How can you be so sure the Great Houses are here for me?

8767219 8771625 They may be curious to hear my
side of the story, don't you think?

8771761 8776527 I am Paul Atreides, son of
Leto Atreides, Duke of Arrakis.
8779661 8781836 Send a warning to all ships.

8781972 8786207 If the Great Houses attack,
our atomics will obliterate all spice fields.

8787508 8789904 - You're out of your mind.
- He's bluffing.

8790039 8792005 Consider what you're
about to do, Paul Atreides.

8805859 8809527 As a servant of the Imperium,
you will bow at my feet.

8809663 8813465 Your feet? You'll be lucky
to keep your head.

8816503 8818338 I'll take the hand
of your daughter.

8822675 8825213 And we will rule together
over the Empire.

8839196 8840954 You have to answer
for my father.
8848401 8852339 Do you know why I killed him?
8855411 8857575 who believed in the rules of the heart.
8858743 8860842 But the heart is not meant to rule.
8865681 8869554 your father was a weak man.

8903018 8906124 Do not stain your hands
on this animal.
8928084 8930280 Why does he take such risks?
8956578 8960073 I'm happy to finally meet you, cousin.

8966216 8971524 Well, you wouldn't be
the first relative I've killed.
8973922 8976958 May thy knife chip and shatter.
8979998 8984537 [CHUCKLES SOFTLY] May thy knife chip and shatter.

9052970 9056543 Any special attention
for the pet?
9243399 9245032 The life debt has been paid.

9245167 9246972 Spare my father now and
I will be your willing bride.

9341093 9344357 My Lord,
the Great Houses have answered.

9344493 9346800 They refuse
to honor your ascendancy.

9397183 9399886 Your brother attacks
the Great Houses.

subtitles.author: LeZee
lines: 59956 63790 The battle for Arrakis took everyone by surprise.
77038 79773 By morning, the Atreides were no more.
99964 102664 Since that night, my father has not been the same.
106364 109871 His inaction is difficult for me to accept.
110007 113103 For, I know he loved Duke Leto Atreides like a son.
125117 128690 This would not be the first time the Harkonnens have done his dirty work.

137032 139767 In the shadows of Arrakis
lie many secrets...
142037 144640 but the darkest of them all may remain.
168492 170666 Shouldn't you go back to the stars,
174703 178267 I'm afraid I won't have enough time to fix things before your coming.

540336 543467 Never stand with your back
towards the open.

543602 545442 How many times do I have
to tell you that, huh?

559520 563619 They do not usually
venture this deep.

563754 565490 They wanna make sure
no Atreides escaped.
565625 568160 You think too much of yourself.

568295 570930 No, no,
we are in the deep desert.

573730 576164 They were here for us,
not for you.

579275 582240 I'm taking you somewhere
they will never find us.

601631 606101 It's full of chemicals,
but good enough for cooling systems.
667096 669296 No, no, no. I'll do it.

735762 737764 Now that the spice fields
have been secured,

737900 741235 I strongly recommend bringing
all troops out of Fremen territories.

741370 743132 We're losing too many men
to the desert.

746344 749442 - I beg your pardon?
- We're losing men to rats.

752347 754381 Fremen!
I can't confirm, my Lord.

754517 756252 Communications are hectic
in the open sands.

756387 759452 Your orders were to control
the whole planet.

761257 763852 - We are.
- I see only half of it.

765526 768461 the South is uninhabitable,
my Lord.
770597 772364 May I suggest you get some rest?

775437 777837 Kill them! Kill them!
Kill them all!
828521 829721 He's asking why we're so late.

841736 845169 - Thanks.
- Stay close to me. Hmm?

1021753 1024552 Look how your Bene Gesserit
propaganda has taken root.

1027185 1029524 Some of them already think
I'm their messiah.

1039364 1042263 If they follow me,
we can disrupt spice production.

1042398 1044638 That's the only way
I can get to the Emperor.

1046038 1047839 Your father didn't believe
in revenge.
1094756 1096354 There is spice in the food.

1185248 1191052 None of us, even dying of thirst,
would ever drink this water.
1201597 1204996 We have a thousand such places.
1209204 1213501 the Lisan al-Gaib will change the face of Arrakis.

1213636 1216678 He will bring back the trees.
He will bring back...

1234658 1238799 Never give your water away,
not even for the dead. Hmm?
1241504 1242799 Why are you showing me this?
1248443 1252142 The mother of the Lisan al-Gaib will be a Reverend Mother.
1257381 1259681 You want me to take her place?

1280204 1282144 and you have no purpose
to serve.

1282279 1286346 What else is left to do then but
to return your water to the well?
1294384 1295922 I think you should feel honored.

1296058 1297957 Well, it was a choice
between this or death,

1298092 1300124 so, you know, forgive me
if I'm not flattered.

1302096 1303699 How does one become
a Reverend Mother?

1303834 1305698 It's different from one culture
to another.

1305834 1307934 Here on Arrakis,
I have no idea.

1314276 1316186 Reverend Mothers are tasked
with holding the memories

1316210 1318056 of all the Reverend Mothers
that came before them,

1318080 1321442 so I'll be given centuries
of pain and sorrow.

1396353 1398392 What are you guys
laughing about?
1404734 1405934 You don't believe in all this?

1411441 1414843 Southern tribes believe a messiah
will come to deliver us from evil.
1414978 1416940 You don't believe in the Lisan al-Gaib?

1421583 1424578 You want to control people,
you tell them a messiah will come.

1424714 1428556 - Mm-hmm.
- Then they'll wait for centuries.

1445208 1448004 He's from the South.
You didn't notice his accent?

1480672 1483407 I must not fear.
Fear is the mind-killer.

1483542 1486614 Fear, the little death
that brings total obliteration.

1486750 1488510 I will face my fear.
I will...

1655184 1657750 My mother was trained
to do that.

1657886 1661188 Poison transmutation is something
advanced Bene Gesserit can do.

1676668 1680108 Let me fight beside you.
That's all I'm asking.
1745370 1749738 Only one step remains and you will become the Kwisatz Haderach.
1753377 1754708 You must do what I did.

1754844 1758047 You must drink
the Water of Life.

1758183 1762256 And your mind, it's gon--
it's gonna open and you will see.

1772902 1777838 If you wanna fight with us,
first thing, you must learn
1777974 1779900 to be one with the desert.

1781342 1784609 So, here is a tent
and enough food.

1784745 1789679 I want you to cross
that small erg and come back.

1791847 1793413 You know how to use
a paracompass?

1799296 1801556 Uh, beside the worms
and the Harkonnens,

1805468 1808934 Centipedes are very nasty.
Not the big ones.

1810772 1814605 But the little ones, you have to worry about.
And... Oh!

1816906 1820743 Don't ever,
ever listen to the jinn.

1837300 1841533 Really, be careful.
They are demons.

1844505 1846571 But it's true.
Don't listen to them.
1935729 1938366 You sandwalk like a drunk lizard.
1941404 1942804 Yeah, I'm doing pretty good so far.

1942935 1945703 Yeah, well, you're not even
in worm territory yet.
1964527 1966427 You have to break up your rhythm.

1972398 1975167 Now, that's interesting
because in the filmbooks I've studied,

1975303 1978967 the anthropologists say, in order to
properly sandwalk, you actually have--

2012836 2016269 You know, I'm the only one who believes
you're gonna make it until summer?

2016404 2018578 Everyone else thinks
you won't make it two weeks.

2019746 2021053 If you wanna follow us
in the desert,

2021077 2022576 you need to know
how windtraps work.

2024381 2026718 They're simple, but they
require constant attention.

2026853 2030018 Uh, this right here,
it captures the moisture

2030153 2031987 and then it carries it
into that pocket.
2032889 2035858 Uh, and these are the filters.

2035994 2037861 They need to be changed
every three days.
2045275 2046969 Stop looking at me like that.

2053879 2056044 He will be back soon.
Don't worry.

2059248 2062788 You're right. If we want
to protect your brother,

2062923 2066127 we need all the Fremen
to believe in the prophecy.
2070393 2075063 We must convert the non-believers one by one.
2077003 2079738 We need to start with the weaker ones.
2109433 2112232 Hey, get out of here. Go.

2335095 2337164 Its shield will
only open when it fires.

2337299 2338976 I know that.
What do you think I'm trying to do?

2339000 2342198 I'll trigger it.
On my signal. Be ready.

2440132 2441864 Who taught you
to fight like that?

2448175 2451505 They were massacred.
Alongside my father.

2456679 2459953 You've been fighting
the Harkonnens for decades.

2460089 2462356 My family's been fighting them
for centuries.

2462492 2467355 I know everything about them.
Their habits, their ways of thinking.

2467491 2468931 You know everything
about the desert.

2468997 2472158 You harness
the very power of it.

2472293 2477333 We can stop them together,
bury them in the sand where they belong.

2477468 2479632 So that this planet
can be yours once more.

2479768 2483643 What would you
have us do? Huh?

2485546 2489682 I? I would...
would strike even further north.
2489818 2491416 Then I will go further north.

2491552 2494487 And the further north you go,
the more likely it is you die.
2538364 2543967 You shall be know among us as Usul.
2545703 2549840 Usul. And now, a Fedaykin is a fighter
2558314 2559987 How do you call the, uh...
2568594 2572565 Muad'Dib is wise in the ways of the desert.
2577201 2581169 The constellation that points to the North Star, we call Muad'Dib.

2591150 2595116 Now you are our brother.
Mmm.

2692551 2695584 Arrakis is so beautiful
when the sun is low.

2702861 2707666 Where you're from, does water
really fall from the sky?

2709733 2713006 Sometimes it rains
for weeks on Caladan.

2713142 2715604 Where you see sand here,
imagine water.

2718578 2722578 Our castle stands on cliffs
high above the sea.

2722713 2725549 If you dive in,
you can't reach the bottom.

2725685 2729553 - You dive in?
- Yes, it's called swimming.
2729688 2732592 I don't-- I don't believe you, Usul.

2751112 2752773 - I love it.
- I hate it.

2767394 2769227 Do you think Stilgar
would teach me?

2774369 2776033 Well, I thought I'd become one,
didn't I?

2780375 2785278 Your blood comes
from Dukes and Great Houses.

2789450 2793352 Here, we're equal,
men and women alike.

2793487 2795552 What we do,
we do for the benefit of all.

2795687 2798258 Well, I'd very much like
to be equal to you.
2815010 2816408 Maybe I'll show you the way.

2921642 2927716 Your orders were to restore
spice production to full capacity.

2927852 2930489 Do you know
what it means if you fail?

2931890 2935989 The Emperor will take spice
out of our control.
2940536 2943029 Or feel mine on your neck.

2973769 2976933 It's been a while since you've
had one of those nightmares.
2981706 2984037 Tell me, what was it about?
2995053 2999393 I'm in the South, and I'm following someone.
3005966 3009865 Millions and millions of people starving to death...

3018077 3021312 You've been exposed
to spice for a long time.

3033593 3035125 We can ask Stilgar
to call it off.

3065555 3069694 Don't try to impress anyone.
You are brave. We all know that.

3078266 3080835 Nothing fancy or you will shame
my teaching.

3080971 3084703 I won't shame you.
I understand.
3084839 3089879 Shai-Hulud decides today if you become Fremen, or if you die.

3530223 3532959 Mm-hmm. Mm-hmm.
I know they do.
3535492 3538058 Our task in the North is nearly done.
3546734 3549470 They will protect him when he comes.
3551742 3556312 The Kwisatz Haderach will be born in the South.
3594855 3596385 The way they look at you.

3601723 3604292 The Fedaykin,
they count your victories.
3604428 3606930 They say you can see the future.
3614205 3617273 I'm a Fedaykin of Sietch Tabr.

3617409 3620011 Yet, we have a Bene Gesserit
among us,

3620146 3621581 fanning the flames
of your legend,

3650475 3652507 She says you should
be coming with us.

3656613 3658480 Because I must continue
fighting in the North,

3658615 3661021 to protect you down
there in the South.

3662585 3665920 She says she can tell
when you lie.

3666056 3669755 Tell her that's because our mother
keeps spreading dangerous tales.
3679007 3681306 She says you're blinded by love,

3681441 3683503 and she reminds you that
you must reserve your hand

3688308 3691583 She's also wondering why
you don't believe in who you are.

3692746 3695055 I believe I matter
to these people.

3696457 3698652 And I believe I'm making
a difference in this war.

3700492 3701972 We're nearly
at the gates of the city.

3702055 3704825 - That's not what she means.
- I know what she means.

3704961 3707600 Do you not think I also feel
the weight of the prophecy?

3709533 3711136 It's a story that you
keep telling,

3711272 3713205 but it's not their story,
it's yours.

3713340 3716440 They deserve to be led
by one of their own.

3716575 3719176 What your people did
to this world is heartbreaking.
3719312 3720878 We gave them something to hope for.
3835823 3838190 eighty percent of our last crop.

3838326 3842093 My Lord Rabban, you should
not leave the security perimeter.

3842228 3844731 Security perimeter?
The rats are already inside.
3844866 3846805 The Fremen Demon might be with them.

3897888 3899728 Why do I have to do
everything myself?

4125749 4128829 It's not the first time
we've had frictions with the Fremen.

4137763 4140159 how would you deal
with this prophet?
4146168 4149234 If this Muad'Dib is a religious figure,

4154044 4157176 Repression only makes
a religion flourish.

4157311 4159483 You'll only end up
humiliating yourself.

4161183 4164249 You underestimate
the power of faith.

4167755 4171729 Her Highness proves once again
that she was my most acute student.

4176703 4178670 Prophets get stronger
when they die.

4180136 4182639 Let the conflict
on Arrakis turn into war.

4182775 4186139 You then bring peace.
As a savior.
4197721 4200090 The one who points the way.

4200225 4202490 These are our own
religious patterns, aren't they?

4210638 4212737 An unusual war name
for a Fremen.

4214538 4217538 - What if Paul Atreides were still alive?
- Enough!

4217673 4222208 This must not come out.
Even to your father's ears. Understand?

4225715 4229048 If Paul is alive,
he likely knows the truth.

4229184 4231056 And should
the Great Houses learn

4231191 4234188 that your father was behind
the liquidation of the Atreides,

4234323 4238059 your father will face war
and lose the throne.

4245036 4249367 We are Bene Gesserit.
We don't hope, we plan.
4250544 4254005 Paul is not our only prospect.

4254140 4259751 The Baron's youngest nephew,
Feyd-Rautha Harkonnen, will inherit Arrakis.

4267189 4271428 The question is,
can we control him?
4271564 4273160 And I intend to find out.

4296289 4299021 Would you like
some fresh meat, my darlings?

4302857 4306027 What would you like?
I hear they're big today.

4306163 4310533 Your new blades
for this very special day,
4362987 4365124 I won't die like a fool.
4366321 4369190 No drug for you today, Atreides.

4446401 4448406 I hope your travels
were agreeable.

4448542 4450950 A long way
to come just to watch our prospect
4455012 4456915 These fights are all for show.

4458182 4460480 But we'll get
a good look at him.
4637023 4639203 Why do they not stop the fight?
4788809 4791276 This morning you were a playboy,

4798456 4800351 I ought to drown you
in that tub.
4804261 4806796 I have another gift for you.

4816841 4819206 He has failed
to protect spice production.

4828420 4831223 Free the spice.
I'll make you Emperor.

4851478 4854609 The Emperor helped me
destroy the Atreides.

4855744 4858617 He lent his own army
to the cause.

4860920 4865521 If it came to light, the Great
Houses would rise against him.
4868622 4871263 who will sit on the throne?

4924312 4929420 Will you show me the way out
of this maze, my Lord na-Baron?

4946605 4948800 I'm here to honor
your coming of age.

4948935 4950903 You're not allowed
in this section.
4951839 4953338 How did you get past the guards?

4957649 4959747 May I ask,
what are you doing here?

4961819 4965456 You're not taking part
in your own celebrations?
4978266 4981237 And what makes you say that?
4983870 4986272 I dreamed about you last night.

4993552 4996454 I know your
Bene Gesserit tricks.

4996589 4999050 And what do you know
about the Bene Gesserit?
5071558 5074829 Put your right hand in the box.

5121781 5125176 Respectfully, why didn't you
test him yourself?

5128922 5132422 And based on what happened
between him and his own mother,
5132558 5134988 I didn't expect to be effective.

5135123 5136924 What happened between
him and his mother?

5149103 5152005 we shall know
how to control him.
5172695 5175098 Rid me of this Fremen Demon.
5225379 5229621 ♪ My stillsuit Is full of piss ♪
5230788 5235121 ♪ My hand is caked in sand ♪
5236830 5238991 ♪ Save me from These utter morons ♪

5253373 5255278 Well, it was nice
knowing ya.
5283009 5284814 Yeah, I got a meter reading--

5284838 5286815 All right, guys,
worms are on their way.

5286839 5288116 - Watch out for abrasions.
- Get ready to dock.

5441331 5443761 Mmm.
After the Battle of Arrakeen,

5443896 5447806 I was able to negotiate a trip
back home for the survivors.
5460846 5464054 Well, since Muad'Dib's been driving Rabban crazy,

5464189 5468955 the smuggling business
has been quite profitable.

5517276 5520406 Do you realize what you're able
to achieve with 200 men?

5523280 5524824 Duncan said there
were millions of them.
5526478 5528618 Well, what are you waiting for?

5528754 5532056 With thousands of these guys,
you could take control of the entire planet.

5532191 5534118 It's your father's dream.
What are you afraid of?

5546905 5548737 Why is that a bad thing?
Use it.

5550875 5553743 You have the power to avenge
your father, and you're afraid to use it?

5560185 5563813 If I go South, all my visions
lead to horror.

5563948 5567557 Billions of corpses
scattered across the galaxy.

5598587 5600387 What?
Look at him, he's hopeless.

5634523 5637226 No need to be a prophet
to see what's ahead.

5648738 5652608 What will you do when you feel
its breath upon your neck?

5656040 5658408 If you don't want to raise
an army in the South,
5658544 5660381 you may still have an option.

5675565 5678300 I know where your father
hid the family atomics.

5683507 5686506 Every House possesses
an atomic arsenal.
5687881 5689806 I thought ours had been lost.

5691878 5694646 It's huge, Chani.
It could change everything.

5699721 5703292 I could aim the bombs
at the main spice fields.

5704860 5708462 He who can destroy a thing
has the real control of it.

5709795 5711630 So, you can control it
and not us?

5713700 5715700 You promised me
you didn't want power.

5717409 5719308 No matter what I do,
you still don't trust me.

5719444 5722410 'Cause you're a foreigner.
Like your friend.
5735257 5737128 But to the desert, you are.
5742133 5744135 I'm doing this for all of us.

5776997 5779599 Nobody would ever look in there
because it's obvious.

5790909 5793250 Enough to blow up
the whole planet.

5868320 5872428 The 92 original Atreides
family's atomic warheads.

5891750 5895311 Reports from the south
of Arrakis arrive rarely.
5895446 5899050 These are barren, burnt lands hidden by sandstorms
5899186 5901853 which stretch a thousand miles across the equator.
5907430 5911896 Which is why our Bene Gesserit missionaries have been so productive there.
5915040 5917902 Through them, we are receiving reports of a mysterious figure
5923549 5926884 A new Reverend Mother from the North...
5927019 5931222 spreading word of the imminent arrival of the Lisan al-Gaib,
5934253 5937422 With religious fervor rising in the South,
5937558 5941257 and Muad'Dib strangling spice production in the North,
5941392 5945303 everything points to the escalation of war.

6087041 6088643 Soon a man
is going to visit your temple

6088779 6091413 and he may want
you to perform the rites.

6204862 6207390 We're literally melting rock
on their heads.

6207525 6210462 I want to go on the ground.
Prepare my troops.

6210598 6213864 - My Lord. I would recommend you stay inside.
- There was--
6214000 6216039 Bring his body to my quarters.

6219272 6221337 There was no food
for them on the flight.

6225212 6228350 It's early morning.
What are you doing here?

6264584 6267625 Embarrass our family
one more time...
6304622 6307362 They didn't even engage on the ground,

6345067 6347771 only leaders
are allowed to speak.

6348874 6351433 - You must take my place.
- I can't do that.

6351569 6354371 It is a good time
to cross blades with me.
6354506 6357910 I am weak. I am an easy kill, Muad'Dib.
6358045 6359810 I'd rather cut off my own hand.
6359945 6362478 We need you. We need the Lisan al-Gaib to lead our people.

6362614 6364447 You know what I think
of all that, Stilgar.

6364582 6367384 I don't care what you believe.
I believe.
6387778 6389807 They just went back to reload.

6391850 6393190 We're moving everyone
to the South.

6393214 6395018 I'll stay behind
and cover your retreat.

6395154 6397788 - What are you talking about?
- Chani, I can't go with you.

6399783 6401703 - I'll stay, too.
- Nobody stays but me.

6401788 6404459 - Paul.
- That's an order, Gurney Halleck! Go South!
6462386 6466516 You cannot see the future without seeing the past.
6468286 6473025 To unlock your mind, you need to drink the Water of Life...
6479705 6483401 A good hunter always climbs the highest dune before his hunt.
6498618 6501056 You must drink the Water of Life.

6526181 6528314 The world has made
choices for us.
6533221 6534886 If I go South, I might lose you.

6541164 6543659 Not as long
as you stay who you are.
6551074 6552969 I'll cross the storms with you.

6563384 6566286 And then I will do
what must be done.
6595817 6598648 They've gone South to hide in the storms.
6603292 6604927 Send this message to the Baron.

6605063 6607256 The North is liberated
and secured.

6625844 6629516 You killed nine of my men
with one single blade.

6634654 6637291 I already know
everything I need to know.
6772297 6776397 Now that you can see our past,
6807465 6810464 you are not prepared for what is to come.
6811899 6815304 You'll now learn the truth about our family.
6815439 6819209 And it will hurt you to the core.

6899887 6902725 His vital signs are so low,
they can't be detected.
6904160 6905856 What did you do to him?

6906925 6909129 No, not that.
Why would he do that?

6919205 6922910 Chani, his body is fighting the
poison and he needs your help.
6926547 6928113 You did this to your own son!

6931219 6934649 Chani, you might not believe in
the prophecy, but you're a part of it.

6936527 6939125 You and your lies.
Why would you do this?

7098050 7102052 I see possible futures.
All at once.
7103020 7106461 Our enemies are all around us.

7106597 7109125 And in so many futures,
they prevail.
7109860 7111930 But I do see a way.
7112931 7115538 There is a narrow way through.
7142527 7145733 You are the daughter of Baron Vladimir Harkonnen.

7155880 7159241 I didn't know myself,
until I took the worm's poison.
7172628 7174894 So this is how we'll survive.

7278000 7280800 Stilgar, you can stop this.
Do you hear me?
7280936 7282533 You have the power to stop this.

7284205 7286045 You are not allowed
to speak inside the circle.

7286074 7287714 If you want to speak,
you know what to do.
7303695 7306527 This prophecy is how they enslave us!
7310635 7311964 This is none of your business.

7312100 7314000 Rabban Harkonnen himself
killed my family.

7314135 7315998 He gave me this scar
to remember him by.
7316133 7318272 This is all of my business.
7367319 7369318 If you wish to share your voice,

7369453 7372287 you must take his place
by defeating him

7372423 7374725 and returning his water
to the well.

7374861 7378834 You think I'm stupid enough to
deprive myself of the best of us?

7428347 7430787 But you think
you could have a chance.
7521308 7523572 This is my father's ducal signet.
7619273 7620771 Was this all upon your advice?

7622776 7625708 Did you counsel my father
to exterminate the Atreides?

7625843 7629282 Of course I did.
Why else would it have happened?

7629417 7631753 You tried to sacrifice
an entire bloodline.
7631889 7633649 And I was right to do it.
7633784 7637023 The Kwisatz Haderach is a form of power
7637159 7639286 that our world has not yet seen.

7645834 7648970 They were promising, but they
were becoming dangerously defiant.

7649106 7652437 Their bloodline
had to be terminated.

7652573 7654939 That is why we have put
many bloodlines at work.

7659348 7660988 And if he defeats
Feyd-Rautha, my father--

7661112 7665419 Your father will lose the
throne no matter who prevails.

7665555 7668457 But there is one way your
family can remain in power

7668592 7672226 and, through you,
the continuation of our stewardship.

7677930 7681037 You've been preparing me
my whole life, Reverend Mother.

7683140 7685540 You're heading north
with the others?

7687237 7690043 I follow my leaders.
If fighting goes north, I go north.

7690178 7691458 Paul didn't have
a choice, Chani.
7691574 7694112 I won't be fighting for him.
7699420 7701453 I came to wish you best of luck.
7706064 7707822 but it seems you've won your battle.

7778830 7781335 I brought spice production
under control.
7786837 7789641 Send messages to the Great Houses.

7789776 7793710 Tell them that Arrakis
is under Sardaukar attack.

7793845 7796911 Tell them, their future
hangs in the balance.
7823875 7826479 When the storm hits this ridge,

7826614 7828777 Gurney will open
the way for you, Stilgar,

7828912 7831284 so you can enter
the basin from the West

7833785 7835485 Chani, I want you
and your Fedaykin
7835621 7837325 to then attack from the East,

7839957 7842162 I'll strike from the North,
head on,

7844400 7847136 And I'll serve Arrakeen
for dessert.

7847271 7849634 Remember,
I need the Emperor alive.
7921173 7925909 do you have any idea who this Muad'Dib could be?

7926044 7929115 Some fanatic, your Majesty.
That's all we know.

7944897 7948003 Or he went hiding
in the Southern storms

7953509 7955804 threatens the integrity
of our shields.

7955940 7957843 We recommend
going back into orbit.

7957979 7960349 Well, the mountains will
protect us from most of it,

7971726 7974327 Well, the entire region
is uninhabitable.

7986774 7989206 I swear to you,
I wasn't aware of any of this.
8602023 8603992 Look who's back from the dead.
8618137 8621669 For my Duke, and my friends.

8693150 8695511 Gurney, it's time.
Bring the prisoners.

8734454 8736652 I will love you
as long as I breathe.

8748665 8751337 There is a massed armada
in orbit.

8754540 8758008 You're facing
a full invasion, Fremen.

8758143 8761644 How can you be so sure
the Great Houses are here for me?

8767219 8771625 They may be curious to hear my
side of the story, don't you think?

8771761 8776527 I am Paul Atreides, son of
Leto Atreides, Duke of Arrakis.
8779661 8781836 Send a warning to all ships.

8781972 8786207 If the Great Houses attack,
our atomics will obliterate all spice fields.

8787508 8789904 - You're out of your mind.
- He's bluffing.

8790039 8792005 Consider what you're
about to do, Paul Atreides.

8805859 8809527 As a servant of the Imperium,
you will bow at my feet.

8809663 8813465 Your feet? You'll be lucky
to keep your head.

8816503 8818338 I'll take the hand
of your daughter.

8822675 8825213 And we will rule together
over the Empire.

8839196 8840954 You have to answer
for my father.
8848401 8852339 Do you know why I killed him?
8855411 8857575 who believed in the rules of the heart.
8858743 8860842 But the heart is not meant to rule.
8865681 8869554 your father was a weak man.

8903018 8906124 Do not stain your hands
on this animal.
8928084 8930280 Why does he take such risks?
8956578 8960073 I'm happy to finally meet you, cousin.

8966216 8971524 Well, you wouldn't be
the first relative I've killed.
8973922 8976958 May thy knife chip and shatter.
8979998 8984537 May thy knife chip and shatter.

9052970 9056543 Any special attention
for the pet?
9243399 9245032 The life debt has been paid.

9245167 9246972 Spare my father now and
I will be your willing bride.

9341093 9344357 My Lord,
the Great Houses have answered.

9344493 9346800 They refuse
to honor your ascendancy.

9397183 9399886 Your brother attacks
the Great Houses.

subtitles.author: chamallow
lines: 4460 11467 Power over Spice is power over all.

60592 64426 The battle for Arrakis took everyone by surprise.
77674 80409 By morning, the Atreides were no more.
100600 103300 Since that night, my father has not been the same.
107000 110507 His inaction is difficult for me to accept.
110643 113739 For, I know he loved Duke Leto Atreides like a son.
125753 127758 This would not be the first time
127759 129326 the Harkonnens have done his dirty work.

137668 140403 In the shadows of Arrakis
lie many secrets...
142673 145276 but the darkest of them all may remain.
169128 171302 Shouldn't you go back to the stars,
175339 178903 I'm afraid I won't have enough time to fix things before your coming.

369228 371128 [HARKONNEN SOLDIER SPEAKING HARKONNEN]
The rats are calling a worm.

379876 382139 [HARKONNEN SQUAD LEADER SPEAKING
HARKONNEN] Unit, climb. Now!

540972 544103 Never stand with your
back towards the open.

544238 545971 How many times do I have
to tell you that, huh?

560156 564255 [GRUNTS] They do not
usually venture this deep.

564390 566126 They wanna make sure
no Atreides escaped.

566261 568796 [STILGAR CHUCKLES]
You think too much of yourself.
568931 571566 No, no, we are in the deep desert.
574366 576800 They were here for us, not for you.

579911 582876 I'm taking you somewhere
they will never find us.

602267 606737 It's full of chemicals, but
good enough for cooling systems.
667732 669932 [PAUL] No, no, no. I'll do it.

736398 738400 Now that the spice
fields have been secured,

738536 741871 I strongly recommend bringing all
troops out of Fremen territories.
742006 743768 We're losing too many men to the desert.

746980 750078 - I beg your pardon?
- We're losing men to rats.
752983 755017 Fremen! I can't confirm, my Lord.

755153 756888 Communications are
hectic in the open sands.

757023 760088 Your orders were to
control the whole planet.

761893 764488 - We are.
- I see only half of it.
766162 769097 the South is uninhabitable, my Lord.
771233 773000 May I suggest you get some rest?
776073 778473 Kill them! Kill them! Kill them all!
829157 830321 He's asking why we're so late.

837537 839902 [SPEAKING IN CHAKOBSA]
You're not welcome here.

842372 845805 - Thanks.
- [STILGAR] Stay close to me. Hmm?

896860 900129 - [ANGRY, INDISTINCT SHOUTING IN CHAKOBSA]
- [STILGAR SPEAKS CHAKOBSA]

923382 925000 [ALL SHOUTING IN CHAKOBSA]
You killed Jamis!
947819 950447 They don't know what they're saying.

964896 967825 [STILGAR SPEAKING CHAKOBSA]
I need your guidance

969669 972162 [SPEAKING CHAKOBSA]
Give them back to the desert.

980352 983396 Stilgar, your faith is
playing tricks on you.

983647 986942 The Lisan al-Gaib has
not shown his face yet!
991488 994574 He killed Jamis in a fair fight.
999120 1001456 He will quickly learn our ways.
1002999 1007254 I'm ready to pledge my life for him.
1008588 1011925 The desert will handle his fate.

1014114 1017806 [OLDEST ELDER GROANS, SPEAKS CHAKOBSA]
What about the woman?

1022389 1025188 Look how your Bene Gesserit
propaganda has taken root.

1027821 1030160 Some of them already
think I'm their messiah.

1040000 1042899 If they follow me, we can
disrupt spice production.

1043034 1045274 That's the only way I
can get to the Emperor.
1046674 1048475 Your father didn't believe in revenge.

1086852 1087981 [SPEAKING CHAKOBSA]
Too spicy for the foreigner?
1095392 1096990 [PAUL] There is spice in the food.

1097126 1098321 [WOMAN SPEAKS CHAKOBSA]
He'll look pretty with blue eyes.

1103350 1106061 He deserves our respect.
He's a good fighter.

1112806 1115282 [PRAYING WATERMASTERS CHANT
IN CHAKOBSA] To the well,

1116284 1119645 [MALE WATERMASTER SPEAKS CHAKOBSA]
We bless our brother, Jamis.

1185884 1191688 None of us, even dying of thirst,
would ever drink this water.
1202233 1205632 We have a thousand such places.
1209840 1214137 the Lisan al-Gaib will change the face of Arrakis.

1214272 1217314 He will bring back the
trees. He will bring back...

1235294 1239435 Never give your water away,
not even for the dead. Hmm?
1242140 1243435 Why are you showing me this?
1249079 1252778 The mother of the Lisan al-Gaib will be a Reverend Mother.

1258017 1260317 [WHISPERS] You want
me to take her place?
1280840 1282780 and you have no purpose to serve.

1282915 1286982 What else is left to do then but
to return your water to the well?
1295020 1296558 I think you should feel honored.

1296694 1298593 Well, it was a choice
between this or death,

1298728 1300760 so, you know, forgive
me if I'm not flattered.
1302732 1304335 How does one become a Reverend Mother?

1304470 1306334 It's different from
one culture to another.
1306470 1308570 Here on Arrakis, I have no idea.

1314912 1316711 Reverend Mothers are tasked
with holding the memories

1316846 1318581 of all the Reverend Mothers
that came before them,

1318716 1322078 so I'll be given centuries
of pain and sorrow.
1396989 1399028 What are you guys laughing about?
1405370 1406465 You don't believe in all this?

1412077 1415479 Southern tribes believe a messiah
will come to deliver us from evil.
1415614 1417576 You don't believe in the Lisan al-Gaib?

1422219 1425214 You want to control people, you
tell them a messiah will come.

1425350 1429192 - Mm-hmm.
- Then they'll wait for centuries.

1445844 1448640 He's from the South. You
didn't notice his accent?

1459290 1460352 [SPEAKING IN CHAKOBSA]
She'll drink worm piss.
1465169 1467164 If she's stupid enough to drink poison.

1468597 1473594 [STILGAR SPEAKING CHAKOBSA]
Shut up! We are praying.

1481308 1484043 [WHISPERS] I must not fear.
Fear is the mind-killer.

1484178 1487250 Fear, the little death that
brings total obliteration.
1487386 1489146 I will face my fear. I will...

1494218 1497858 [OLD WATERMASTER SPEAKING CHAKOBSA]
Here is the Water of Life.

1619365 1621778 - That was no miracle!
- You saw it with your own eyes!

1624016 1625994 [STILGAR SPEAKING CHAKOBSA]
The Mother of the Lisan al-Gaib

1646445 1648575 [CHANI SPEAKING CHAKOBSA]
Arrakis must be freed by its own people!
1655820 1658386 My mother was trained to do that.

1658522 1661824 Poison transmutation is something
advanced Bene Gesserit can do.
1674045 1676464 I'm here to learn your ways.

1677304 1680744 Let me fight beside you.
That's all I'm asking.

1686111 1687971 [STILGAR SPEAKING CHAKOBSA]
The Mahdi is too humble
1687972 1693770 to say He is the Mahdi.
1694273 1696776 Even more reason to know He is!

1738030 1742069 [SPEAKING CHAKOBSA] Kwisatz
Haderach, show us the way.
1746006 1750374 Only one step remains and you will become the Kwisatz Haderach.
1754013 1755344 You must do what I did.
1755480 1758683 You must drink the Water of Life.

1758819 1762892 And your mind, it's gon... it's
gonna open and you will see.

1773538 1778474 [STILGAR] If you wanna fight with
us, first thing, you must learn
1778610 1780536 to be one with the desert.
1781978 1785245 So, here is a tent and enough food.

1785381 1790315 I want you to cross that
small erg and come back.
1792483 1794049 You know how to use a paracompass?
1799932 1802192 Uh, beside the worms and the Harkonnens,

1806104 1809570 Centipedes are very
nasty. Not the big ones.

1811408 1815241 But the little ones, you have
to worry about. And... Oh!
1817542 1821379 Don't ever, ever listen to the jinn.
1837936 1842169 Really, be careful. They are demons.
1845141 1847207 But it's true. Don't listen to them.

1850880 1852311 [CHANI SPEAKING CHAKOBSA]
He doesn't know how to cross.
1853516 1856018 Stilgar is going to get him killed.
1856519 1858050 What is he trying to prove?

1861482 1864735 "The Prophet shall know
the ways of the desert."
1871909 1874036 I think it's for the best.
1881418 1884004 He's not like the other strangers.

1936365 1939002 [CHANI] You sandwalk
like a drunk lizard.
1942040 1943436 Yeah, I'm doing pretty good so far.

1943571 1946339 Yeah, well, you're not
even in worm territory yet.

1965163 1967063 [CHANI] You have to
break up your rhythm.

1973034 1975803 [PAUL] Now, that's interesting
because in the filmbooks I've studied,

1975939 1978702 the anthropologists say, in
order to properly sandwalk,
2013472 2015315 You know, I'm the only one who believes
2015316 2016905 you're gonna make it until summer?

2017040 2019214 Everyone else thinks you
won't make it two weeks.
2020382 2021578 If you wanna follow us in the desert,
2021713 2023212 you need to know how windtraps work.

2025017 2027354 They're simple, but they
require constant attention.

2027489 2030654 Uh, this right here,
it captures the moisture
2030789 2032623 and then it carries it into that pocket.
2033525 2036494 Uh, and these are the filters.

2036630 2038497 They need to be changed
every three days.
2045911 2047605 Stop looking at me like that.
2054515 2056680 He will be back soon. Don't worry.

2059884 2063424 You're right. If we want
to protect your brother,

2063559 2066763 we need all the Fremen to
believe in the prophecy.
2071029 2075699 We must convert the non-believers one by one.
2077639 2080374 We need to start with the weaker ones.

2110069 2112868 [FEDAYKIN FIGHTER WHISPERS]
Hey, get out of here. Go.

2251275 2252942 [FEDAYKIN FIGHTER AND
CHANI SHOUTING IN CHAKOBSA]

2335731 2337800 [PAUL] Its shield will
only open when it fires.

2337935 2339501 [CHANI] I know that. What do
you think I'm trying to do?

2339636 2342834 [PAUL] I'll trigger it.
On my signal. Be ready.
2421333 2425212 He saw it coming, and he saved her life.

2432493 2434226 [SPEAKING IN CHAKOBSA]
Muad'Dib likes his smell.
2440768 2442500 Who taught you to fight like that?

2448811 2452141 They were massacred.
Alongside my father.

2457315 2460589 You've been fighting the
Harkonnens for decades.

2460725 2462992 My family's been fighting
them for centuries.

2463128 2467991 I know everything about them. Their
habits, their ways of thinking.
2468127 2469497 You know everything about the desert.
2469633 2472794 You harness the very power of it.

2472929 2477969 We can stop them together, bury
them in the sand where they belong.

2478104 2480268 So that this planet
can be yours once more.

2480404 2484279 [DEEPLY INHALES] What
would you have us do? Huh?

2486182 2490318 I? I would... [SIGHS] would
strike even further north.
2490454 2492052 Then I will go further north.

2492188 2495123 And the further north you go,
the more likely it is you die.
2499911 2502539 But the others will keep going.

2503665 2506501 And they won't stop
until the Fremen are free.
2539000 2544603 You shall be know among us as Usul.
2546339 2550476 [STILGAR] Usul. And now, a Fedaykin is a fighter
2558950 2560623 How do you call the, uh...
2569230 2573201 Muad'Dib is wise in the ways of the desert.
2577837 2581805 The constellation that points to the North Star, we call Muad'Dib.
2591786 2595752 Now you are our brother. Mmm.

2693187 2696220 Arrakis is so beautiful
when the sun is low.

2703497 2708302 Where you're from, does water
really fall from the sky?
2710369 2713642 Sometimes it rains for weeks on Caladan.
2713778 2716240 Where you see sand here, imagine water.

2719214 2723214 Our castle stands on
cliffs high above the sea.

2723349 2726185 If you dive in, you
can't reach the bottom.

2726321 2730189 - [CHANI] You dive in?
- Yes, it's called swimming.
2730324 2733228 [LAUGHS] I don't... I don't believe you, Usul.

2751748 2753409 - I love it.
- I hate it.
2768030 2769863 Do you think Stilgar would teach me?

2771529 2774869 [CHANI LAUGHS] No.
Only Fremen ride worms.

2775005 2776669 Well, I thought I'd
become one, didn't I?

2781011 2785914 Your blood comes from
Dukes and Great Houses.
2790086 2793988 Here, we're equal, men and women alike.

2794123 2796188 What we do, we do for
the benefit of all.

2796323 2798894 Well, I'd very much
like to be equal to you.
2815646 2817044 Maybe I'll show you the way.

2917874 2922143 [BARON HARKONNEN] Fremen

in your own celebrations?

4978902 4981873 And what makes
you say that?
4984506 4986908 I dreamed about you last night.

4994188 4997090 I know your
Bene Gesserit tricks.

4997225 4999686 And what do you know
about the Bene Gesserit?
5072194 5075465 Put your right hand in the box.

5122417 5125812 Respectfully, why didn't you
test him yourself?

5129558 5133058 And based on what happened
between him and his own mother,

5133194 5135624 I didn't expect
to be effective.

5135759 5137560 What happened between
him and his mother?

5149739 5152641 we shall know
how to control him.

5169461 5171630 The new Planetary
Governor of Arrakis!
5173331 5175734 Rid me of this Fremen Demon.

5226015 5230257 ♪ My stillsuit
Is full of piss ♪
5231424 5235757 ♪ My hand is caked in sand ♪

5237466 5239627 ♪ Save me from
These utter morons ♪

5254009 5255914 Well, it was nice

5283645 5285338 Yeah, I got a meter reading--

5285474 5287340 All right, guys,
worms are on their way.

5287475 5288641 Watch out
for abrasions.
Get ready to dock.

5441967 5444397 Mmm.
After the Battle of Arrakeen,

5444532 5448442 I was able to negotiate a trip
back home for the survivors.

5461482 5464690 Well, since Muad'Dib's
been driving Rabban crazy,

5464825 5469591 the smuggling business
has been quite profitable.

5476065 5478967 I've heard many stories
about Muad'Dib.

5517912 5521042 Do you realize what you're able
