5523916 5525348 Duncan said there
were millions of them.
5527114 5529254 Well, what are you waiting for?

5529390 5532692 With thousands of these guys,
you could take control
of the entire planet.

5532827 5534754 It's your father's dream.
What are you afraid of?

5547541 5549373 Why is that a bad thing?
Use it.

5551511 5554379 You have the power to avenge
your father,
and you're afraid to use it?

5560821 5564449 If I go South, all my visions
lead to horror.

5564584 5568193 Billions of corpses
scattered across the galaxy.

5599223 5601023 What?
Look at him, he's hopeless.
5618744 5621413 What do you think of the outsider?

5635159 5637862 No need to be a prophet
to see what's ahead.

5649374 5653244 What will you do when you feel
its breath upon your neck?

5656676 5659044 If you don't want to raise
an army in the South,
5659180 5661017 you may still have an option.

5676201 5678936 I know where your father
hid the family atomics.

5684143 5687142 Every House possesses
an atomic arsenal.
5688517 5690442 I thought ours had been lost.

5692514 5695282 It's huge, Chani.
It could change everything.

5700357 5703928 I could aim the bombs
at the main spice fields.

5705496 5709098 He who can destroy a thing
has the real control of it.

5710431 5712266 So, you can control it
and not us?

5714336 5716336 You promised me
you didn't want power.

5718045 5719944 No matter what I do,
you still don't trust me.

5720080 5723046 'Cause you're a foreigner.
Like your friend.
5735893 5737764 But to the desert, you are.
5742769 5744771 I'm doing this for all of us.

5777633 5780235 Nobody would ever look in there
because it's obvious.

5791545 5793886 Enough to blow up
the whole planet.

5868956 5873064 The 92 original
Atreides family's
atomic warheads.

5892386 5895947 Reports from
the south of Arrakis
arrive rarely.

5896082 5899686 These are barren, burnt lands
hidden by sandstorms

5899822 5902489 which stretch a thousand miles
across the equator.

5904295 5907931 Nothing can live there
without faith.

5908066 5912532 Which is why
our Bene Gesserit missionaries
have been so productive there.

5915676 5918538 Through them,
we are receiving reports
of a mysterious figure

5924185 5927520 A new Reverend Mother
from the North...

5927655 5931858 spreading word
of the imminent arrival
of the Lisan al-Gaib,

5934889 5938058 With religious fervor
rising in the South,

5938194 5941893 and Muad'Dib
strangling spice production
in the North,

5942028 5945939 everything points
to the escalation of war.
5956999 5960127 or they fight each other to death.
5969136 5971513 My daughter asks, how is it done?

6087677 6089279 Soon a man
is going to visit your temple

6089415 6092049 and he may want
you to perform the rites.

6100454 6100517 No man will survive.
Let him try!

6205498 6208026 We're literally melting rock
on their heads.

6208161 6211098 I want to go on the ground.
Prepare my troops.

6211234 6214500 My Lord. I would recommend
you stay inside.
There was--
6214636 6216675 Bring his body to my quarters.

6219908 6221973 There was no food
for them on the flight.

6225848 6228986 It's early morning.
What are you doing here?

6265220 6268261 Embarrass our family
one more time...
6304429 6305258 I lost them all in the fire!

6305258 6306390 I lost them all in the fire!
They didn't even
engage on the ground,

6306390 6307998 They didn't even
engage on the ground,
6312354 6314773 The whole of the North has been hit.

6319820 6322781 There is a call for a war council
in the South.

6345703 6348407 only leaders
are allowed to speak.

6349510 6352069 - You must take my place.
- I can't do that.

6352205 6355007 It is a good time
to cross blades with me.

6355142 6358546 I am weak.
I am an easy kill, Muad'Dib.
6358681 6360446 I'd rather cut off my own hand.

6360581 6363114 We need you.
We need the Lisan al-Gaib
to lead our people.

6363250 6365083 You know what I think
of all that, Stilgar.

6365218 6368020 I don't care what you believe.
I believe.
6388414 6390443 They just went back to reload.

6392486 6393715 We're moving everyone
to the South.

6393850 6395654 I'll stay behind
and cover your retreat.

6395790 6398424 - What are you talking about?
- Chani, I can't go with you.

6400419 6402289 I'll stay, too.
- Nobody stays but me.

6402424 6405095 Paul.
- That's an order,
Gurney Halleck! Go South!

6410994 6413121 None of these people
will leave without you.

6463022 6467152 You cannot see the future
without seeing the past.

6468922 6473661 To unlock your mind,
you need to drink
the Water of Life...

6480341 6484037 A good hunter
always climbs the highest dune
before his hunt.
6488579 6490241 as far as he can see.

6499254 6501692 You must drink
the Water of Life.

6526817 6528950 The world has made
choices for us.

6533857 6535522 If I go South,
I might lose you.

6541800 6544295 Not as long
as you stay who you are.

6551710 6553605 I'll cross
the storms with you.

6564020 6566922 And then I will do
what must be done.

6596453 6599284 They've gone South
to hide in the storms.

6603928 6605563 Send this message
to the Baron.

6605699 6607892 The North is liberated
and secured.

6626480 6630152 You killed nine of my men
with one single blade.

6635290 6637927 I already know
everything I need to know.
6716967 6719595 You're not allowed in here, stranger.
6729938 6733984 If you drink, you shall die.
6734735 6738822 If you drink, you may see.
6772933 6777033 Now that you can see our past,

6808101 6811100 you are not prepared
for what is to come.

6812535 6815940 You'll now learn the truth
about our family.

6816075 6819845 And it will hurt you
to the core.
6840132 6841967 They just arrived from the North.

6900523 6903361 His vital signs are so low,
they can't be detected.
6904796 6906492 What did you do to him?

6907561 6909765 No, not that.
Why would he do that?

6914581 6919253 The Lisan al-Gaib should find His way
to where no man has ever been.

6919841 6920921 You're insane!
Chani, his body
is fighting the poison
and he needs your help.

6920921 6923546 Chani, his body
is fighting the poison
and he needs your help.

6927183 6928749 You did this
to your own son!

6931855 6935285 Chani, you might not believe
in the prophecy,
but you're a part of it.

6937163 6939761 You and your lies.
Why would you do this?

6952452 6958876 He shall come back from the dead
with Desert Spring tears.
6961545 6964047 Bring me a drop of Water of Life.

7098686 7102688 I see possible futures.
All at once.
7103656 7107097 Our enemies are all around us.

7107233 7109761 And in so many futures,
they prevail.
7110496 7112566 But I do see a way.
7113567 7116174 There is a narrow way through.

7143163 7146369 You are the daughter
of Baron Vladimir Harkonnen.

7156516 7159877 I didn't know myself,
until I took the worm's poison.
7173264 7175530 So this is how we'll survive.

7278636 7281436 Stilgar, you can stop this.
Do you hear me?

7281572 7283169 You have the power
to stop this.

7284841 7286575 You are not allowed
to speak inside the circle.

7286710 7288278 If you want to speak,
you know what to do.

7304331 7307163 This prophecy
is how they enslave us!

7311271 7312600 This is none
of your business.

7312736 7314636 Rabban Harkonnen himself
killed my family.

7314771 7316634 He gave me this scar
to remember him by.
7316769 7318908 This is all of my business.

7367955 7369954 If you wish
to share your voice,

7370089 7372923 you must take his place
by defeating him

7373059 7375361 and returning his water
to the well.

7375497 7379470 You think I'm stupid enough
to deprive myself
of the best of us?

7380839 7383506 Do you smash a knife
before battle?

7383506 7383800 Do you smash a knife
before battle?
Take my life, Usul.

7393977 7400692 There is no one in this room
who can stand against me!

7412746 7416542 Your mothers warned you
about my coming!

7428983 7431423 But you think
you could have a chance.
7437813 7440274 What if I could be the One?

7441233 7445487 This could be the moment you've been
praying for, all your life.

7448156 7452202 You're praying now,
to your grandmother.

7460794 7464590 A rock smashed her face
as she was crossing the Belt.

7468510 7473265 At that time, this world
had a Fremen name.

7488322 7492826 In your nightmares,
you give water to the dead,
7493118 7494616 and it brings joy to your heart!

7494616 7494912 and it brings joy to your heart!
Muad'Dib!
7504129 7506673 Mahdi, what do you foresee for us?
7512012 7516558 Lisan al-Gaib, show us the Way!

7521944 7524208 This is my father's
ducal signet.
7540707 7542918 The Hand of God be my witness!
7543418 7545879 I am the Voice from the Outer World!
7546171 7548135 I will lead you to paradise!

7548135 7548549 I will lead you to paradise!
- Lisan al-Gaib!

7619909 7621407 Was this all upon
your advice?

7623412 7626344 Did you counsel my father
to exterminate the Atreides?

7626479 7629918 Of course I did. Why else
would it have happened?

7630053 7632389 You tried to sacrifice
an entire bloodline.

7632525 7634285 And I was right
to do it.

7634420 7637659 The Kwisatz Haderach
is a form of power

7637795 7639922 that our world
has not yet seen.

7646470 7649606 They were promising,
but they were becoming
dangerously defiant.

7649742 7653073 Their bloodline
had to be terminated.

7653209 7655575 That is why we have put
many bloodlines at work.

7659984 7661612 And if
he defeats Feyd-Rautha,
my father--

7661748 7666055 Your father
will lose the throne
no matter who prevails.

7666191 7669093 But there is one way
your family can remain
in power

7669228 7672862 and, through you,
the continuation
of our stewardship.

7678566 7681673 You've been preparing me
my whole life,
Reverend Mother.

7683776 7686176 You're heading north
with the others?

7687873 7690679 I follow my leaders.
If fighting goes north,
I go north.

7690814 7692075 Paul didn't have
a choice, Chani.
7692210 7694748 I won't be fighting for him.

7700056 7702089 I came to wish you
best of luck.

7706700 7708458 but it seems
you've won your battle.

7779466 7781971 I brought spice production
under control.

7787473 7790277 Send messages
to the Great Houses.

7790412 7794346 Tell them that Arrakis
is under Sardaukar attack.

7794481 7797547 Tell them, their future
hangs in the balance.

7824511 7824533 He brought his whole army.
When the storm
hits this ridge,

7824533 7827115 When the storm
hits this ridge,

7827250 7829413 Gurney will open
the way for you, Stilgar,

7829548 7831920 so you can enter
the basin from the West

7834421 7836121 Chani, I want you
and your Fedaykin

7836257 7837961 to then attack
from the East,

7845036 7847772 And I'll serve Arrakeen
for dessert.

7847907 7850270 Remember,
I need the Emperor alive.

7921809 7926545 do you have any idea
who this Muad'Dib could be?

7926680 7929751 Some fanatic, your Majesty.
That's all we know.

7945533 7948639 Or he went hiding
in the Southern storms

7951237 7952436 They speak the truth.
Your Majesty,

7952572 7952995 They speak the truth.
the sand storm
that's approaching

7954145 7956440 threatens the integrity
of our shields.

7956576 7958479 We recommend
going back into orbit.

7972362 7974963 Well, the entire region
is uninhabitable.

7987410 7989842 I swear to you,
I wasn't aware
of any of this.
8502711 8505047 Bring the prisoners to the Residency.
8510636 8513138 Give the Baron's body to the desert.
8602659 8604628 Look who's back from the dead.
8618773 8622305 For my Duke, and my friends.

8693786 8696147 Gurney, it's time.
Bring the prisoners.

8735090 8737288 I will love you
as long as I breathe.

8749301 8751973 There is a massed armada
in orbit.

8755176 8758644 You're facing
a full invasion, Fremen.

8758779 8762280 How can you
be so sure the Great Houses
are here for me?

8767855 8772261 They may be curious
to hear my side of the story,
don't you think?

8772397 8777163 I am Paul Atreides,
son of Leto Atreides,
Duke of Arrakis.
8780297 8782472 Send a warning to all ships.

8782608 8786843 If the Great Houses attack,
our atomics will obliterate
all spice fields.

8788144 8790540 - You're out of your mind.
- He's bluffing.

8790675 8792641 Consider what you're
about to do, Paul Atreides.

8806495 8810163 As a servant of the Imperium,
you will bow at my feet.

8810299 8814101 Your feet? You'll be lucky
to keep your head.

8817139 8818974 I'll take the hand
of your daughter.

8823311 8825849 And we will rule together
over the Empire.

8839832 8841590 You have to answer
for my father.
8849037 8852975 Do you know why I killed him?

8856047 8858211 who believed
in the rules of the heart.

8859379 8861478 But the heart
is not meant to rule.
8866317 8870190 your father was a weak man.

8903654 8906760 Do not stain your hands
on this animal.
8928720 8930916 Why does he take such risks?

8957214 8960709 I'm happy
to finally meet you, cousin.

8966852 8972160 Well, you wouldn't be
the first relative I've killed.
8974558 8977594 May thy knife chip and shatter.
8980634 8985173 May thy knife chip and shatter.

9053606 9057179 Any special attention
for the pet?

9216968 9219936 You, of all people,
should know.

9220071 9224841 There are no sides...
Reverend Mother.
9244035 9245668 The life debt has been paid.

9245803 9247496 Spare my father now
and I will be
your willing bride.

9341729 9344993 My Lord,
the Great Houses have answered.

9345129 9347436 They refuse
to honor your ascendancy.

9348736 9352067 We await your orders,
Lisan al-Gaib.

9397819 9400522 Your brother attacks
the Great Houses.

lines:
61129 64610 The battle for Arrakis
took everyone by surprise.

69006 72009 The Harkonnen operation
was perpetrated overnight,
72183 75969 without warning or declaration of war.
78233 80583 By morning, the Atreides were no more.

101125 103575 Since that night, my father
has not been the same.

107653 111004 His inaction
is difficult for me to accept.

111179 114007 For, I know he loved
Duke Leto Atreides like a son.
120449 122102 But my father's always been guided

126629 130179 This would not be the first time the
Harkonnens have done his dirty work.

138206 140556 In the shadows of Arrakis
lie many secrets...
143211 145387 but the darkest of them all may remain.
169802 171502 Shouldn't you go back to the stars,

176069 179419 I'm afraid I won't have enough time
to fix things before your coming.
369698 372396 The rats are calling a worm.

541521 544655 Never stand with your
back towards the open.

544829 546573 How many times do I have
to tell you that, huh?
560715 564849 They do not usually venture this deep.
565023 566767 They wanna make sure no Atreides escaped.
566851 569245 You think too much of yourself.
569419 571943 No, no, we are in the deep desert.
574990 577253 They were here for us, not for you.

580386 583346 I'm taking you somewhere
they will never find us.

602844 606848 It's full of chemicals,
but good enough for cooling systems.
668126 670085 No, no, no. I'll do it.

736978 739128 Now that the spice fields
have been secured,

739154 742404 I strongly recommend bringing all
troops out of Fremen territories.
742461 744249 We're losing too many men to the desert.

747423 750252 - I beg your pardon?
- We're losing men to rats.

753429 755474 Fremen!
I can't confirm, my Lord.

755648 757392 Communications are hectic
in the open sands.

757476 760262 Your orders were to control
the whole planet.

762307 765093 - We are.
- I see only half of it.
766659 769271 the South is uninhabitable, my Lord.
771751 773449 May I suggest you get some rest?

776539 778758 Kill them! Kill them!
Kill them all!
829635 831135 He's asking why we're so late.
842910 846174 Thanks. Stay close to me. Hmm?
948363 950756 They don't know what they're saying.

965293 969819 I need your guidance
with the two foreigners.
969993 972604 Give them back to the desert.

979220 983137 Stilgar, your faith is
playing tricks on you.

983311 987141 The Lisan al-Gaib has not
shown his face yet!
991406 995410 He killed Jamis in a fair fight.
999022 1001938 He will quickly learn our ways.
1003418 1007683 I'm ready to pledge my life for him.
1007857 1012775 The desert will handle his fate.

1022915 1025515 Look how your Bene Gesserit
propaganda has taken root.

1028443 1030643 Some of them already think
I'm their messiah.

1040672 1043545 If they follow me, we can
disrupt spice production.

1043719 1045919 That's the only way
I can get to the Emperor.
1047244 1049094 Your father didn't believe in revenge.
1095858 1097599 There is spice in the food.
1097773 1099373 He'll look pretty with blue eyes.

1103300 1105500 He deserves our respect.
He's a good fighter.
1113876 1116574 To the well, our water we return.

1186470 1191910 None of us, even dying of thirst,
would ever drink this water.
1202617 1205837 We have a thousand such places.

1210407 1214803 the Lisan al-Gaib will change
the face of Arrakis.

1214977 1217477 He will bring back the trees.
He will bring back...

1235998 1239567 Never give your water away,
not even for the dead. Hmm?
1242483 1243883 Why are you showing me this?

1249707 1253015 The mother of the Lisan al-Gaib
will be a Reverend Mother.
1258629 1260718 You want me to take her place?

1278475 1281217 Mmm.
Then, he's not Lisan al-Gaib,
1281391 1283306 and you have no purpose to serve.

1283480 1287266 What else is left to do then but
to return your water to the well?
1295623 1297173 I think you should feel honored.

1297189 1299151 Well, it was a choice
between this or death,

1299235 1301485 so, you know, forgive me
if I'm not flattered.
1303239 1304809 How does one become a Reverend Mother?

1304893 1306811 It's different from one culture
to another.

1306895 1308723 Here on Arrakis,
I have no idea.

1315469 1317300 Reverend Mothers are tasked
with holding the memories

1317384 1319127 of all the Reverend Mothers
that came before them,

1319211 1322389 so I'll be given centuries
of pain and sorrow.
1397551 1399291 What are you guys laughing about?
1405733 1406954 You don't believe in all this?

1412653 1415953 Southern tribes believe a messiah
will come to deliver us from evil.
1416047 1418006 You don't believe in the Lisan al-Gaib?

1423054 1425930 You want to control people,
you tell them a messiah will come.

1426014 1429496 - Mm-hmm.
- Then they'll wait for centuries.

1446338 1449080 He's from the South.
You didn't notice his accent?
1465183 1467272 If she's stupid enough to drink poison.

1481939 1484594 I must not fear.
Fear is the mind-killer.

1484768 1487554 Fear, the little death
that brings total obliteration.
1487728 1489730 I will face my fear. I will...
1494822 1498565 Here is the Water of Life.
1620643 1622143 You saw it with your own eyes!
1624908 1626649 The mother of the Lisan al-Gaib
1646800 1648976 Arrakis must be freed by its own people!
1656244 1658986 My mother was trained to do that.

1659160 1662260 Poison transmutation is something
advanced Bene Gesserit can do.
1673957 1675872 I'm here to learn your ways.

1677918 1680834 Let me fight beside you.
That's all I'm asking.

1687231 1693977 The Mahdi is too humble
to say He is the Mahdi.
1694151 1696240 Even more reason to know He is!
1738543 1742243 Kwisatz Haderach, show us the way.

1746769 1750642 Only one step remains and you will
become the Kwisatz Haderach.
1754472 1755909 You must do what I did.
1756083 1759347 You must drink the Water of Life.

1759521 1763003 And your mind, it's gon-- it's
gonna open and you will see.

1774188 1778757 If you wanna fight with us,
first thing, you must learn
1778932 1780847 to be one with the desert.
1782413 1785764 So, here is a tent and enough food.

1785939 1790552 I want you to cross
that small erg and come back.
1793076 1794602 You know how to use a paracompass?
1800344 1802694 Uh, beside the worms and the Harkonnens,

1806568 1809876 Centipedes are very nasty.
Not the big ones.

1811965 1815446 But the little ones, you have
to worry about. And... Oh!
1818145 1821626 Don't ever, ever listen to the jinn.

1838339 1842343 Really, be careful.
They are demons.

1845607 1847391 But it's true.
Don't listen to them.
1851308 1853180 He doesn't know how to cross.
1853354 1855054 Stilgar is going to get him killed.
1856835 1858315 What is he trying to prove?

1861492 1863842 "The Prophet shall know
the ways of the desert."
1871720 1873330 I think it's for the best.
1881425 1883166 He's not like the other strangers.
1936872 1939092 You sandwalk like a drunk lizard.
1942443 1944056 Yeah, I'm doing pretty good so far.

1944140 1946590 Yeah, well, you're not even
in worm territory yet.
1965596 1967196 You have to break up your rhythm.

1973735 1976523 Now, that's interesting because
in the filmbooks I've studied,

1976607 1980257 the anthropologists say, in order to properly
sandwalk, you actually have--

2014297 2017651 You know, I'm the only one who believes
you're gonna make it until summer?

2017735 2020135 Everyone else thinks
you won't make it two weeks.
2020869 2022221 If you wanna follow us in the desert,
2022305 2023744 you need to know how windtraps work.

2025700 2027922 They're simple, but they require
constant attention.

2028006 2031227 Uh, this right here,
it captures the moisture
2031401 2033351 and then it carries it into that pocket.
2034056 2037015 Uh, and these are the filters.
2037190 2039190 They need to be changed every three days.
2046242 2047852 Stop looking at me like that.

2055033 2056948 He will be back soon.
Don't worry.

2060517 2063912 You're right. If we want
to protect your brother,

2064086 2067045 we need all the Fremen
to believe in the prophecy.

2071702 2075967 We must convert
the non-believers one by one.
2078187 2080537 We need to start with the weaker ones.
2110741 2113179 Hey, get out of here. Go.
2336227 2338316 Its shield will only open when it fires.

2338491 2340017 I know that. What do you
think I'm trying to do?

2340101 2343060 I'll trigger it.
On my signal. Be ready.
2441245 2442899 Who taught you to fight like that?

2449297 2452430 They were massacred.
Alongside my father.

2457958 2461004 You've been fighting

2461178 2463529 My family's been fighting them

2463703 2468534 I know everything about them. Their habits,

2468708 2469973 You know everything about the desert.

2473756 2478500 We can stop them together,

2478674 2480894 So that this planet

2490817 2492601 Then I will go further north.

2592222 2596183 Now you are our brother. Mmm.

2714170 2716477 Where you see sand here, imagine water.

3034664 3036147 We can ask Stilgar to call it off.

3086281 3090720 Shai-Hulud decides today if you

3531334 3533685 Mm-hmm.

3548003 3550353 They will protect him when he comes.

3701635 3703292 We're nearly at the gates of the city.

4211666 4213494 An unusual war name for a Fremen.

4297491 4299841 Would you like some fresh meat,

4307327 4311505 Your new blades for this very special day,

4519060 4522020 In celebration

6388798 6390843 They just went back to reload.

6488985 6490552 as far as he can see.

6773399 6777186 Now that you can see our past,

6813135 6816355 You'll now learn the truth

6901092 6903592 His vital signs are so low,

6914192 6916542 The Lisan al-Gaib should find His way

6951577 6955886 He shall come back from the dead

7110997 7112782 But I do see a way.
7114087 7116264 There is a narrow way through.

7143856 7146511 You are the daughter

7279122 7281864 Stilgar, you can stop this.

7282038 7283588 You have the power to stop this.

7285389 7287133 You are not allowed

7304713 7307498 This prophecy is how they enslave us!
7311633 7313083 This is none of your business.
7313243 7315204 Rabban Harkonnen himself killed my family.
7315288 7317238 He gave me this scar to remember him by.
7317290 7319162 This is all of my business.
7368516 7370518 If you wish to share your voice,

7380484 7382486 Do you smash a knife before battle?
7394150 7397414 There is no one in this room

7437149 7439804 What if I could be the One?

7439978 7444548 This could be the moment you've

7459911 7464133 A rock smashed her face

7467528 7471880 At that time, this world

7489811 7491987 you give water to the dead

7502519 7506262 Mahdi, what do you foresee for us?
7522452 7524497 This is my father's ducal signet.
7540557 7542864 The Hand of God be my witness.
7543038 7545214 I am the Voice from the Outer World.
7620376 7621826 Was this all upon your advice?

7624032 7626948 Did you counsel my father

7627122 7630386 Of course I did. Why else

7630560 7632693 You tried to sacrifice

7632867 7634869 And I was right to do it.
7635043 7638046 The Kwisatz Haderach is a form of power

7653757 7656107 That is why we have put

7660459 7662459 And if he defeats Feyd-Rautha, my father--

7662461 7666552 Your father will lose the throne

7666727 7669599 But there is one way your

7669773 7672994 and, through you, the continuation

7688618 7691145 I follow my leaders. If fighting

7692753 7695146 I won't be fighting for him.
7700543 7702284 I came to wish you best of luck.
7707071 7708821 but it seems you've won your battle.

7845470 7848125 And I'll serve Arrakeen for dessert.

7848299 7851302 Remember,
I need the Emperor alive.

7922460 7927117 do you have any idea

7954579 7956973 threatens the integrity of our shields.
7957147 7959019 We recommend going back into orbit.

7959193 7961693 Well, the mountains will protect
us from most of it,
7972858 7975339 Well, the entire region is uninhabitable.

7987917 7990180 I swear to you, I wasn't
aware of any of this.
8502300 8504389 Bring the prisoners to the Residency.

8603053 8604707 Look who's back from the dead.
8619200 8622594 For my Duke, and my friends.

8735577 8737535 I will love you as long as I breathe.

8772962 8777358 I am Paul Atreides, son of Leto

8780840 8783059 Send a warning to all ships.

8791328 8793377 Consider what you're

8807083 8810652 As a servant of the Imperium,

8810826 8814264 Your feet? You'll be lucky

8817615 8819365 I'll take the hand of your daughter.
8823839 8826233 And we will rule together over the Empire.
8840203 8841901 You have to answer for my father.
8849473 8853086 Do you know why I killed him?
8856480 8858395 who believed in the rules of the heart.
8859919 8861746 But the heart is not meant to rule.
8866838 8870364 your father was a weak man.
8904267 8907096 Do not stain your hands on this animal.
8929031 8931294 Why does he take such risks?

8967504 8972292 Well, you wouldn't be
the first relative I've killed.
8975121 8977862 May thy knife chip and shatter.
8981214 8985305 May thy knife chip and shatter.

9217580 9220540 You, of all people, should know.

lines: 61029 64510 The battle for Arrakis took everyone by surprise.

111079 113907 For, I know he loved Duke Leto Atreides like a son.
126529 129358 This would not be the first time the Harkonnens have done his dirty work.

169702 171313 Shouldn't you go back to the stars,
